name: SMARCsXEL E
memory: Up to 8 GByte LPDDR4 memory with in-band ECC support
io: 4x USB, 2x USB 2.0, 2x SATA, 2x LAN, PCIe, HDMI, DP, LVDS, eDP, serial interfaces, HD Audio, I2S, I2C, SPI, GPIOs
thermal: Industrial temperature grade versions available, passive cooling options
feature: TSN support, Trusted Platform Module (TPM), Industrial Temperature Grade versions
specification: Supports Intel Atom, Pentium, Celeron processors, up to 8 GByte LPDDR4 memory, multiple I/O interfaces, industrial temperature range, TPM, TSN support
location: Kontron Europe GmbH, Gutenbergstraße, Ismaning, Germany
description: The SMARCsXEL E is a SMARC module featuring the latest generation Intel Atom, Pentium, and Celeron processors, designed for industrial applications with support for in-band ECC memory, multiple I/O interfaces, and industrial temperature ranges.
summary: SMARCsXEL E is a high-performance SMARC module with Intel Atom, Pentium, and Celeron processors, offering robust industrial features and extensive I/O support.

name: CM Industrial V
size: Length x Width x Height: Not available
io: Gigabit Ethernet, USB, HDMI, microSD Card Slot, SIM Card Slot, ADC, RS232, RS485, Isolated DI, Relay, SPI Flash, RTC, Buzzer, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, miniPCIe, UART, GPIO, microUSB, PoE
thermal: Fan control interface, adjustable speed fan control
feature: Supports Raspberry Pi Compute Module, multiple industrial communication interfaces, PoE function, dual-band WiFi, Bluetooth, 4G LTE module support, onboard serial Flash, wide power supply range, ESD protection
specification: CPU: BCM2837, ARM Cortex-A53, 1.2 GHz, 64-bit; Memory: 1GB, 2GB, 4GB, 8GB RAM options; eMMC: 8GB, 16GB, 32GB, 64GB options; Ethernet: Dual Gigabit Ethernet; WiFi: Dual-band; Bluetooth: 4.2; 4G LTE: Optional; HDMI: Standard HDMI, FPC HDMI; USB: Multiple USB interfaces; GPIO: Raspberry Pi compatible; Power Input: 5V DC, 9-24V DC; Operating Temperature: -20°C to 70°C
location: Room 101, Building 1, No. 123 Jialuo Highway, Jiading District, Shanghai
description: CM Industrial is an industrial embedded computer based on the Raspberry Pi Compute Module, designed for IoT gateway, industrial control, advertising display, and intelligent manufacturing applications.
summary: CM Industrial V is an industrial embedded computer featuring the Raspberry Pi Compute Module, offering extensive communication interfaces, dual-band WiFi, Bluetooth, 4G LTE support, and a wide power supply range, suitable for various industrial applications.

name: VIIMA RIIMA
processor: AMD Ryzen Embedded V1000/R1000 Series APU
memory: DDR4 2400MHz, ECC support, Max 32GB, 2 x SODIMM
io: DisplayPort, LVDS, eDP, USB 3.1 Gen 1, USB 2.0, Ethernet, Serial Port, Audio jack, DC jack
thermal: CPU Fan header, Chassis Fan header, PWM mode
feature: Up to four 4K displays, Wide temperature range endurance (-40°C to 85°C), Up to 10-year longevity supply
specification: Supports up to four 4K displays, PCIe x16 slot, PCIe x4 slot, M.2 M key, M.2 E key, Realtek ALC888S audio codec, Realtek RTL8111H Ethernet controller, TPM 2.0 support
description: The VIIMA RIIMA is an industrial motherboard designed for high-performance applications, featuring AMD Ryzen Embedded APUs, multiple display outputs, and extensive connectivity options.
summary: Industrial motherboard with AMD Ryzen Embedded APUs, supporting up to four 4K displays and wide temperature range endurance.

name: CM Industrial V
size: Length x Width x Height: Not available
io: Gigabit Ethernet, USB, HDMI, microSD Card Slot, SIM Card Slot, ADC, RS232, RS485, Isolated DI, Relay, SPI Flash, RTC, Buzzer, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, miniPCIe, UART, GPIO, microUSB, PoE
thermal: Fan control interface, adjustable speed fan control
feature: Supports Raspberry Pi Compute Module, multiple industrial communication interfaces, PoE function, dual-band WiFi, Bluetooth, 4G LTE module support, onboard 8Mb serial Flash, wide power supply range, ESD protection
specification: CPU: BCM2837, 4 cores, 1.2 GHz; Memory: 1GB, 2GB, 4GB, 8GB RAM options; eMMC: 8GB, 16GB, 32GB, 64GB options; Ethernet: Dual net port, 1x Gigabit Ethernet, 1x 100Mbps Ethernet; WiFi: Dual-band; Bluetooth: Yes; 4G LTE: Yes; HDMI: 1x standard HDMI, 1x FPC HDMI; USB: 2x USB Type A, 1x USB integrated Mini PCIe interface, 2x USB Host Pin Header, 1x USB microB; RS232: 1x; RS485: 2x; ADC: 3 channels; Isolated DI: 2 channels; Relay: 2x double-pole double-throw; GPIO: Raspberry Pi compatible; RTC: Yes; Buzzer: Yes; Fan: Adjustable speed control; Power input: 12V (9V-36V for V1.0, 9V-24V for V1.1); Dimensions: Not available; Case: Full Metal Shell; Antenna: WiFi/BT, 4G LTE
location: Room 101, Building 1, No. 388 Jialuo Highway, Jiading District, Shanghai
description: CM Industrial is an industrial embedded computer based on the Raspberry Pi Compute Module. It is designed for various industrial applications, providing robust communication capabilities and multiple interfaces.
summary: CM Industrial V is an industrial embedded computer featuring the Raspberry Pi Compute Module, offering extensive communication interfaces, dual-band WiFi, Bluetooth, 4G LTE support, and a wide power supply range.

name: SOMCR Intel thth Gen Core Processors
io: PCIe x16 Gen4, PCIe x4 Gen4, PCIe x1 Gen3, USB 3.2 Gen2x1, USB 2.0, SATA III, Soundwire, HDA, eDP, DDI, GbE, GPIO, COM, SPI, SMBus, I2C, TPM
thermal: Smart Fan, Operating Temperature: 0°C to 60°C, Storage Temperature: -40°C to 85°C
feature: High scalability, iRIS Xe graphic engine, Supports iManager, WISE-PaaS/DeviceOn embedded software APIs
specification: Form Factor: COMHPC Size C Module, Socket Type: LGA, Platform Controller Hub: Intel PCH, BIOS: AMI UEFI, Memory: SODIMM DDR4 with ECC/non-ECC, max 64GB, PCIe: x16 Gen4, x4 Gen4, x1 Gen3, USB: 3.2 Gen2x1, 2.0, SATA III, Soundwire, HDA, eDP, DDI, GbE, GPIO, COM, SPI, SMBus, I2C, TPM, Power: 12V, 5VSB, 3.3V, 3.3VSB, 5V, RTC Battery, Operating Temperature: 0°C to 60°C, Storage Temperature: -40°C to 85°C
description: The SOMCR Intel thth Gen Core Processors are high-performance COMHPC Size C modules featuring Intel Alder Lake-S and Raptor Lake-S processors. They offer high scalability, advanced graphics with iRIS Xe, and support for various embedded software APIs.
summary: High-performance COMHPC Size C modules with Intel Alder Lake-S and Raptor Lake-S processors, offering advanced graphics and embedded software support.

name: Strato Pi CM Duo
memory: Supports Raspberry Pi Compute Module Lite, 8GB, 16GB, 32GB eMMC versions
io: RS-485 serial port, Ethernet port, two USB type-A ports, dual microSD card slots, GPIO pins
thermal: Ensure proper ventilation to prevent overheating
feature: Surge and reverse polarity protection, hardware watchdog, real-time clock with backup battery, secure element chip, dual microSD card architecture
specification: Power supply: 9-28 VDC, Current consumption: 200mA (low CPU load) to 500mA (high CPU load), RS-485 communication port, ESD and surge protection, Operating temperature: -20°C to 70°C, Storage temperature: -40°C to 85°C, IP20 protection degree
description: Strato Pi CM Duo is a powerful and compact industrial server based on the Raspberry Pi Compute Module, suitable for professional and industrial applications where reliability and service continuity are key requirements.
summary: Strato Pi CM Duo is an industrial server based on the Raspberry Pi Compute Module, featuring surge and reverse polarity protection, hardware watchdog, real-time clock with backup battery, secure element chip, and dual microSD card architecture.

name: congaQA
processor: Intel Atom E3800 series, Intel Celeron J1900, Intel Celeron N2930, Intel Celeron N2807
io: 1x Gigabit Ethernet, 4x USB 2.0, 1x USB 3.0, 2x SATA, 1x SDIO, 4x PCIe, I2C Bus, LPC bus, 1x SPI, eMMC onboard flash (up to 64GB optional)
thermal: Passive cooling solution, Industrial grade temperature range -40°C to +85°C
feature: Intel HD Graphics, DirectX 11, OpenGL 3.2, OpenCL 1.1, OpenGLES 2.0, full HW acceleration decode/encode MPEG2, H.264, MVC, dual simultaneous display support, Dual channel LVDS transmitter, Digital Display Interface (DDI), DisplayPort 1.1
specification: Qseven Form Factor Rev 2.0 compliant, 70 x 70 mm, Intel Atom E3800 series, Intel Celeron J1900, Intel Celeron N2930, Intel Celeron N2807, Up to Quad Core, Up to 2.42 GHz, Dual Channel 8GB onboard DDR3L 1333/1600 MT/s, 1x Gigabit Ethernet, 4x USB 2.0, 1x USB 3.0, 2x SATA, 1x SDIO, 4x PCIe, I2C Bus, LPC bus, 1x SPI, eMMC onboard flash (up to 64GB optional), Intel HD Graphics, DirectX 11, OpenGL 3.2, OpenCL 1.1, OpenGLES 2.0, full HW acceleration decode/encode MPEG2, H.264, MVC, dual simultaneous display support, Dual channel LVDS transmitter, Digital Display Interface (DDI), DisplayPort 1.1, Passive cooling solution, Industrial grade temperature range -40°C to +85°C
description: The congaQA is a high-performance Computer on Module (COM) based on the Qseven form factor, featuring Intel Atom and Celeron processors. It offers robust graphics capabilities, extensive I/O interfaces, and is suitable for industrial applications with a wide temperature range.
summary: High-performance Qseven COM with Intel Atom and Celeron processors, robust graphics, extensive I/O, and industrial-grade temperature range.

It is easy to integrate key peripherals and display systems for diversified self-service and interactive signage applications. The systems deliver updated information and well-designed interactive interfaces to fully ensure relevant content and targeted promotions are delivered.

description: Featuring a quad-core 64-bit processor, wireless networking, dual-display output, and 4K video playback, the Raspberry Pi is a complete personal computer built into a compact keyboard. It is ideal for surfing the web, creating and editing documents, watching videos, and learning to program using the Raspberry Pi OS desktop environment.
summary: The Raspberry Pi is a compact personal computer with a quad-core 64-bit processor, wireless networking, dual-display output, and 4K video playback, built into a keyboard.

processor: AMD R-Series G-series T40E 1.0 GHz dual core

feature: RoHS compliant, supports multiple storage options (SATA, CFast, MicroSD), various I/O connectivity, supports railway and military applications
specification: Processor: Intel Core i7-4700EQ, Intel Xeon E3-1505M v5, Intel Xeon E3-1505L v5; Memory: Up to 16 GB DDR4 2133 MHz ECC/Non-ECC; I/O: Multiple Ethernet, USB, VGA, HDMI, COM ports; Storage: SATA, CFast, MicroSD; Compliance: PICMG 2.0 R3.0, PICMG 2.1 R2.0, EN 50155, EN 50121-3-2
description: Advantech MIC Series CompactPCI processor blade using Intel 14nm technology provides significant performance and power efficiency. It is designed for high-performance computing in railway rolling stock and military applications.
summary: Advantech MIC Series CompactPCI processor blade with Intel 14nm Xeon/Core processors, up to 16 GB DDR4 memory, multiple I/O options, and optimized for railway and military applications.

name: congaBAC
memory: Dual channel DDR4 2400 MT/s, up to 64 GByte, optionally with ECC support
io: Up to 20 PCIe Gen 3 lanes, 4x USB 3.0, 4x USB 2.0, 2x SATA III 6 Gbps, LPC, SPI, 2x UART, SMBus
thermal: Standard heatspreader, active and passive cooling solutions available
feature: Server Class Features, RAS, QoS, Virtualization, Security, Manageability
specification: COM Express Type 7 Basic module, integrated SoC, up to 4x GbE KR interface, eMMC onboard flash up to 64 GByte, congatec Board Controller, Multi Stage Watchdog, nonvolatile User Data Storage, Manufacturing Board Information, Board Statistics, I2C bus fast mode 400 kHz multimaster, Power Loss Control, Hardware Health Monitoring, POST Code redirection, Embedded BIOS Features, OEM Customization, Flash Update based on AMI Aptio UEFI, Trusted Platform Module (TPM), ACPI battery support
description: The congaBAC is a COM Express Type 7 Basic module based on the Intel Atom C3000 series processors, offering up to 16 cores, dual channel DDR4 memory, and a variety of I/O interfaces. It is designed for industrial and server-class applications with features like RAS, QoS, and virtualization.
summary: COM Express Type 7 Basic module with Intel Atom C3000 series processors, up to 16 cores, dual channel DDR4 memory, and extensive I/O interfaces for industrial and server-class applications.

name: DPXS
memory: Up to 16 GB DDR4 2400 MT/s SDRAM
io: 6x RS232 Serial Ports, 2x CCTalk/RS232, 2x RSTTL, 2x RS485, 4x USB 2.0, 4x USB 3.0, 2x USB 3.1, 1x IC board header
thermal: Configurable smart fan control, CPU and system fans, CPU core temp thermal trip
feature: High performance integrated PCIExpress graphics, TPM security device, Intrusion detection, Watchdog Timer, System Health Monitoring
specification: System: 6th Generation Intel Core Low Power Dual/Quad Core CPUs, High performance chipset graphics system HD, DDR4 SODIMMs up to 16 GB total RAM, 2x Gigabit Ethernet LAN, 2x CFast sockets, 2x SATA DOM sockets, Audio onboard 7.1 channel amp, 32 kB SRAM, 512 kB ROM, EEPROM
description: The DPXS is the latest single board computer in the proven DPXS series, integrated for gaming platforms. It features Intel's latest embedded chipset, providing a range of price and performance choices with dual-core Celeron and quad-core Xeon/Core CPUs. It is suitable for demanding applications with high performance integrated graphics and comprehensive gaming features.
summary: The DPXS is a high-performance single board computer designed for gaming platforms, featuring Intel's latest embedded chipset, dual-core and quad-core CPU options, integrated graphics, and comprehensive I/O and security features.

name: UNOG Intel Atom Pocket-Size Smart Factory Edge Gateway
processor: Intel Atom E3815 (Single Core, 1.46 GHz) / Intel Atom E3826 (Dual Core, 1.46 GHz)
io: 2 x GbE, 4 x USB, 1 x HDMI, 2 x RS-232/422/485, 1 x mPCIe
thermal: Fanless design, Operating Temperature: -20 ~ 60 °C (-4 ~ 140 °F), Storage Temperature: -40 ~ 85 °C (-40 ~ 185 °F), Relative Humidity: 95% @ 40 °C (non-condensing)
feature: Compact fanless design, Rubber stopper design, internal reserved screws, 2nd layer assembly, Diverse system IO, isolated digital IO, iDoor technology, Supports Fieldbus protocol, iDoor technology, 3G/GPS/GPRS/WiFi communication, iDoor technology, Supports iDoor combination, four main categories smart factory applications, 64 GB eMMC storage onboard
specification: General Certification: CE, FCC, UL, CCC, BSMI; Dimensions: 100 x 70 x 30 mm; Enclosure: Aluminum Housing; Mounting: Stand, Wall, VESA, Optional DIN-rail, Optional Pole; Weight: 0.7 kg (1.54 lbs); Power Requirement: 12 VDC; Power Consumption: 6 W Typical, 12 W Max; OS Support: For mSATA storage: Windows 7, Windows 10 LTSB, Advantech Linux; For eMMC storage: Advantech embedded customized Windows 10 64-bits, Windows 10 LTSB, Advantech Linux; System Hardware: BIOS: AMI EFI 64 Mbit; Watchdog Timer: Programmable 255 levels timer interval, 1~255 sec; Processor: Intel Atom E3815 Single Core 1.46 GHz, Intel Atom E3826 Dual Core 1.46 GHz; System Chip: Intel Atom SoC integrated; Memory: Onboard 4 GB DDR3L 1333 MHz; Graphics Engine: Intel HD Graphics; Ethernet: Realtek RTL8111E 2 x GbE; LED Indicators: LEDs for Power, HDD, LAN Active Status; Storage: Onboard 64 GB eMMC, Option: mSATA (shared mPCIe slot); Expansion: 1 x Full-size mPCIe slot; IO Interfaces: Serial Ports: 2 x RS-232/422/485, LAN Ports: 2 x RJ-45 10/100/1000 Mbps IEEE 802.3u
description: Advantech's new generation UNO series embedded automation computers feature highly ruggedized fanless modular designs. The new UNO series includes pocket-size and regular-sized form factors for different kinds of smart factory applications.
summary: The UNOG Intel Atom Pocket-Size Smart Factory Edge Gateway is a compact, fanless industrial IoT gateway designed for smart factory applications. It features an Intel Atom processor, 4 GB onboard memory, diverse I/O options, and supports Advantech's iDoor technology for flexible expansion.

name: SOM Intel Xeon Processor D COM Express R Type Module
frequency: Base Frequency: 1.6 GHz - 2.2 GHz, Max Single Core Turbo Frequency: 2.8 GHz - 3.0 GHz
memory: Dual Channel DDR4 2133 MHz, ECC/non-ECC, Max Capacity: 128 GB, Socket: 4 x 260-pin SODIMM
io: PCIe x16, PCIe x8, PCIe x4, PCIe x1, SATA III, USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SPI Bus, GPIO, COM Port, Ethernet: 10GBase-KR, 1GBase-T
thermal: Active cooling, Smart Fan Ports
feature: Supports iManager, Embedded Software APIs, WisePaaS/RMM
specification: Form Factor: COM Express Basic Module, Pinout Type: COM Express R2.1 Type 7 compatible, CPU: Xeon D-1500 series, Pentium D-1500 series, Memory: Dual Channel DDR4 2133 MHz, ECC/non-ECC, Max Capacity: 128 GB, Socket: 4 x 260-pin SODIMM, Expansion: PCIe x16, PCIe x8, PCIe x4, PCIe x1, Ethernet: 10GBase-KR, 1GBase-T, Power: ATX: 12V, 5VSB, AT: 12V, Operating Temperature: Standard: 0°C to 60°C, Extended: -40°C to 85°C
description: The SOM Intel Xeon Processor D COM Express R Type Module is a high-performance computer on module designed for demanding applications. It features Intel Xeon D and Pentium D processors, dual-channel DDR4 memory, and extensive I/O options including PCIe, SATA, USB, and Ethernet.
summary: High-performance COM Express module with Intel Xeon D processors, dual-channel DDR4 memory, and extensive I/O options.

name: Blackbird Embedded Processing Unit
io: Two Gigabit Ethernet, Two mini DisplayPort, LVDS video outputs, Three Mini PCIe Sockets, Two USB 2.0 ports, Four USB 3.0 ports, Four RS-232 serial ports, Two SATA ports, 24 Digital IO lines, 8 Analog Inputs, 4 Analog Outputs, HD Audio
thermal: Heat plate standard, optional heat sink, fan, and heat pipe thermal accessories available
feature: MIL-STD-810G qualified, TPM security chip, wide input voltage range, reverse voltage protection, RF noise filtering, transient voltage protection
specification: Supports Windows, Windows Embedded, Linux, VxWorks; 95 x 95 x 37 mm; 6th Gen Intel Core Skylake processor; Up to 32 GB DDR4 RAM; 8 to 30 volts DC input; MIL-STD-810G qualified; TPM security chip; Heat plate standard, optional heat sink, fan, and heat pipe thermal accessories available
description: The Blackbird is a compact, rugged, board-level embedded computer designed to meet the evolving requirements of military and medical industries. It features a Skylake processor with quad and dual-core options, HyperThreading, and a wide range of IO features, all within a compact footprint.
summary: The Blackbird Embedded Processing Unit is a compact, rugged computer designed for military and medical applications, featuring a Skylake processor, extensive IO options, and robust thermal management.

name: COMebBD Module
io: 4x USB 3.0, 4x USB 2.0, 4x PCIe Gen3, 4x PCIe Gen2, 2x SATA, 2x GbE
thermal: Heatspreader plate assembly, active/passive cooling solutions
feature: Supports industrial temperature range, Intel Turbo Boost Technology, Intel Hyper-Threading Technology, Intel Virtualization Technology
specification: Supports DDR4 memory, PCIe Gen3, SATA, USB 3.0, GbE, SPI boot, Watchdog Timer, TPM, ACPI, and various power management features
description: The COMebBD Module is a Computer-on-Module (COM) based on the COM Express BASIC TYPE form factor, featuring Intel Xeon Dxx family processors. It is designed for high-performance computing in embedded applications, supporting up to 32GB of DDR4 memory, multiple I/O interfaces, and industrial temperature ranges.
summary: High-performance COM Express BASIC TYPE module with Intel Xeon Dxx processors, supporting up to 32GB DDR4 memory and various I/O interfaces for embedded applications.

name: EDIPC Series
processor: Broadcom BCM quad core Cortex-A53 ARM v8 64-bit SoC
voltage: Wide voltage power input range DC 9V-36V
io: Dual LANs (2x Gigabit Ethernet, 1x 100M Ethernet), multiple RS ports, HDMI, USB, Micro SD card slot, Nano SIM card slot, GPIO, CSI, DSI, Audio In/Stereo Out
thermal: Not available
feature: High reliability, industrial-grade, wide temperature range, integrated supercapacitor-backup power supply, RTC, Watch Dog, EEPROM crypto authentication, high-quality metal case, DIN-rail installation
specification: Supports Raspberry Pi OS (Desktop and Lite, 32-bit and 64-bit), multiple storage options (eMMC, Micro SD, NVMe SSD), various I/O interfaces, wireless connectivity options (WiFi, Bluetooth, 4G LTE), multiple expansion options
description: High Reliability Industrial Computer Based on Raspberry Pi CM, featuring a Broadcom BCM quad core Cortex-A53 ARM v8 64-bit SoC, up to 8GB LPDDR4 RAM, and various I/O and expansion options.
summary: The EDIPC Series is a high reliability industrial computer based on Raspberry Pi CM, designed for robust performance in industrial environments with extensive I/O and expansion capabilities.

name: WCSXB
io: XBus Port, PIA Port, Px Port, Micro USB TIDE Port
thermal: Not available
feature: Internal system monitor ROM, ANSI Standard C compiler, Twin Tone Generator, FTDI UART Interfaced Serial Port
specification: WCS MCU operating at 16 MHz, 32 Kbytes SRAM, 32 Kbytes FLASH ROM, PLCC Socket mapped to upper 32 KB Memory Map overlays IO pins, WCS PIA, FA, FAMS, 32-pin XBus Connector, Twin Tone Generator, FTDI UART Interfaced Serial Port, 5V Powered via Micro USB Connector
description: The WCSXB is based around the WCS 16-bit microcontroller, featuring a rich set of functionalities for applications requiring in-system diagnostics. It is ideal for robust math applications, sensing pressure, temperature, RPM, flow monitoring, control variable climate control systems, scientific, automotive, communications, and home appliance automation.
summary: The WCSXB is a feature-rich single board computer based on the WCS 16-bit microcontroller, designed for applications requiring in-system diagnostics and robust performance in various fields including scientific, automotive, and home automation.

name: Computer On Modules
frequency: Base Frequency: 2.8 GHz - 3.5 GHz, Turbo Boost Frequency: 3.6 GHz - 4.0 GHz
memory: Dual DDR4 2133 V Low Power Memory, Max 32GB
io: PCIe x16, PCIe x4, PCIe x1, SATA III, USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SPI, GPIO, COM Port, Ethernet, VGA, LVDS, HDMI, DVI, DP
thermal: Active cooling solutions, Smart Fan support
feature: Supports iManager, SUSIAccess Embedded Software APIs, TPM, Multiple Display support, Intel HD Graphics
specification: Compliance: COM Express R3.0 Type 6, Platform: Intel Skylake-H, Chipset: Intel QM170, BIOS: AMI UEFI, Memory: DDR4, Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, Expansion: PCIe, Audio: Intel HD Audio, Ethernet: Intel GbE, Power: ATX, Environment: Operating Temp: 0°C to 60°C, Storage Temp: -40°C to 85°C, Humidity: 95% non-condensing
description: The Computer On Modules features 6th Gen Intel Xeon/Core/Celeron Processors, COM Express Basic Module Type 6, and supports dual DDR4 memory up to 32GB. It offers flexible I/O support including PCIe, LAN, TPM, and various display interfaces.
summary: A versatile Computer On Module with 6th Gen Intel processors, supporting up to 32GB DDR4 memory, multiple I/O options, and advanced thermal management.

name: SOM B
voltage: 5V power, 5VSB needed for ACPI ATX power
io: PCI Express, Serial ATA, USB, LVDS, HD Audio
thermal: Standard Thermal Solutions, Customized Thermal Solutions
feature: Supports Intel Embedded Gen 6.0 GFX Core, MPEG2 Decode HW, PCI Express, SATA interfaces, Dual display support, High definition audio interface
specification: Supports Intel Atom N2600/D2550 processors, Intel ICH8M chipset, DDR3 memory up to 4GB, SATAII channels, USB ports, PCIe x1, PCIe x4, PCIe x16 options, LVDS interface, HD Audio, Gigabit Ethernet
description: The SOM B is an embedded COMExpress Compact CPU module that fully complies with the PCI Industrial Computer Manufacturers PICMG COM Express standard. It supports Intel Atom N2600/D2550 processors and provides scalable high performance and easy integration for customer applications.
summary: SOM B is a high-performance, compact System On Module (SOM) supporting Intel Atom N2600/D2550 processors, designed for easy integration and diverse applications.

name: conga-HPC/cALS
memory: Dual channel DDR4, up to 128 GByte system capacity, 3200 MT/s
io: 4x PCIe Gen4, 8x PCIe Gen3, 2x USB 4.0, 2x USB 3.2, 4x USB 2.0, 2x SATA, 2x UART, 12x GPIO, Audio: Soundwire/HDA, 2x GbE TSN Ethernet
thermal: Operating Temp: 0°C to 60°C, Storage Temp: -40°C to 85°C, Operating Humidity: 10% to 90% r.H. non-condensing, Storage Humidity: 5% to 95% r.H. non-condensing
feature: Intel UHD Graphics driven by Xe Architecture, AI Acceleration based on Intel Deep Learning, congatec Board controller, Multi Stage Watchdog, non-volatile User Data Storage, Manufacturing Board Information, Board Statistics, I²C bus (fast mode, 400 kHz, multi-master), Power Loss Control, Hardware Health Monitoring, POST Code redirection, Embedded BIOS Feature, AMI Aptio UEFI firmware, 32 Mbyte serial SPI, congatec Embedded BIOS feature, OEM Logo, OEM CMOS default settings, LCD Control, Display Auto Detection, Backlight Control, Flash Update, Security: Trusted Platform Module (TPM), Power Management: ACPI, battery support, Operating Systems: Microsoft Windows 10, Microsoft Windows 11, Microsoft Windows IoT Enterprise, Linux, Yocto, Real Time Systems Hypervisor
specification: Intel hybrid design combines Performance-cores and Efficient-cores, Intel UHD Graphics driven by Xe Architecture, PCI Express Gen4, USB 4.0, AI Acceleration based on Intel Deep Learning, Embedded Use Condition SKUs, Form factor: COM-HPC Client Size C, Processor Socket: LGA1700, DRAM: Dual channel DDR4, up to 128 GByte system capacity, 3200 MT/s, Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics, Display: 3x DDI, 1x eDP, Ethernet: 2x GbE TSN Ethernet via Intel i225-LM, I/O Interfaces: 4x PCIe Gen4, 8x PCIe Gen3, 2x USB 4.0, 2x USB 3.2, 4x USB 2.0, 2x SATA, 2x UART, 12x GPIO, Audio: Soundwire/HDA, congatec Board controller, Multi Stage Watchdog, non-volatile User Data Storage, Manufacturing Board Information, Board Statistics, I²C bus (fast mode, 400 kHz, multi-master), Power Loss Control, Hardware Health Monitoring, POST Code redirection, Embedded BIOS Feature, AMI Aptio UEFI firmware, 32 Mbyte serial SPI, congatec Embedded BIOS feature, OEM Logo, OEM CMOS default settings, LCD Control, Display Auto Detection, Backlight Control, Flash Update, Security: Trusted Platform Module (TPM), Power Management: ACPI, battery support, Operating Systems: Microsoft Windows 10, Microsoft Windows 11, Microsoft Windows IoT Enterprise, Linux, Yocto, Real Time Systems Hypervisor
description: The conga-HPC/cALS is a COM-HPC Client module based on the 12th Gen Intel Core processors (Alder Lake-S) with a hybrid design combining Performance-cores and Efficient-cores, Intel UHD Graphics driven by Xe Architecture, and support for PCI Express Gen4 and USB 4.0. It is designed for embedded use conditions and offers extensive I/O interfaces and advanced features for industrial applications.
summary: COM-HPC Client module with 12th Gen Intel Core processors, hybrid design, Intel UHD Graphics, PCIe Gen4, USB 4.0, and extensive I/O interfaces for embedded applications.

name: iMX M Nano Applications Processor
size: 14mm x 14mm depop package, 9mm x 9mm depop package
frequency: Cortex-A53: up to 1.5 GHz, Cortex-M7: up to 750 MHz
io: MIPI-DSI, MIPI-CSI, SDIO, USB, Gigabit Ethernet, SPDIF, UART, I2C, SPI, eMMC, NAND, QuadSPI
thermal: Low thermal system cost
feature: Heterogeneous multicore processing, GPU with OpenGL ES, OpenCL, Vulkan support, High-fidelity audio processing, Machine learning support with eIQ software suite, Voice control solutions
specification: High-performance compute with Cortex-A53 and Cortex-M7 cores, Secure resource allocation, Multiple connectivity options, Advanced audio processing, Intelligence at the edge, System design optimization with pin-compatible packages
description: The iMX M Nano family applications processors provide affordable performance for smart, connected, power-efficient devices requiring graphics, vision, voice control, intelligent sensing, and general-purpose processing.
summary: The iMX M Nano family offers scalable, versatile, and affordable applications processors with high-performance compute, advanced audio processing, and machine learning capabilities, optimized for low power and thermal efficiency.

processor: Intel 8th Generation Core and Celeron Processors

description: The COMecWL ES is a COM Express Compact Type 6 module featuring 8th Generation Intel Core and Celeron Processors, up to 32 GByte DDR4 memory, and optional NVMe SSD onboard. It is designed for industrial applications with extended temperature ranges and includes Kontron's APPROTECT security solution.
summary: COMecWL ES is a COM Express Compact Type 6 module with 8th Generation Intel Core and Celeron Processors, up to 32 GByte DDR4 memory, and optional NVMe SSD onboard, suitable for industrial applications.

name: UniStar Smart Business Series VA Standby Single Phase UPS
voltage: Input Voltage: 120 VAC, Voltage Range: 90-140 VAC
io: Not available
thermal: Not available
feature: Battery backup, Surge protection, LED Indicator, Audible alarms, Full protection (Overload, Discharge, Overcharge)
specification:
MODEL: SB 600VA/360W, SB 800VA/480W, SB 1000VA/600W
INPUT: Voltage: 120 VAC, Voltage Range: 90-140 VAC
OUTPUT: Voltage Regulation (Bat Mode): ±10%, Transfer Time: Typical 4-8 ms, Waveform: Simulated Sinewave
BATTERY: Battery Type: 12V/7Ah x 1, 12V/9Ah x 1, 12V/9Ah x 2, Typical Recharge Time: 4-6 hours to recover 90% capacity, Load Runtime (min): 5-20 minutes
PROTECTION: Overload, Discharge, Overcharge Protection
INDICATORS: AC Mode (Green), Battery Mode (Yellow), Fault (Red)

description: The UniStar Smart Business Standby SB UPS offers reliable power protection and battery backup for desktop computers, workstations, networking devices, POS systems, and entertainment systems. It provides battery backup and surge-protected outlets to meet the demands of multiple devices in a highly reliable package.
summary: The UniStar Smart Business Series VA Standby Single Phase UPS by Staco Energy Products Co. provides reliable power protection and battery backup for various electronic devices, featuring surge protection, LED indicators, and audible alarms.

name: CPU Ultra Low Power SBCCoM NXP iMX
form: Computer Module (CoM) and Single Board Computer (SBC)
core: Single Core, Dual Core, Quad Core
io: Ethernet, USB, Serial, Digital IO, Video, Camera Interfaces, Audio, PCI Express, SPI
thermal: Low power configurations, little need for heat dissipation, optional support for industrial temperature range
feature: Ultra Low Power, HD Multimedia Playback, Rugged, Efficient, IoT Native, Long LifeCycle
type: Single Board Computers, Computer on Modules
specification: Processor: NXP iMXSolo (Single Core ARM Cortex-A9 1GHz), NXP iMXDualLite (Dual Core ARM Cortex-A9 1GHz), NXP iMXDual (Dual Core ARM Cortex-A9 1GHz), NXP iMXQuad (Quad Core ARM Cortex-A9 1GHz); Memory: Up to 2GB DDR3L Soldered-down; Storage: Up to 16GB eMMC Soldered-down, SATA (iMXDual, iMXQuad Only), On Board Flash Expansion: 1x microSD slot (up to 32GB), Off Board Flash Expansion: 1x 8-bit SD port; Stand Alone SBC IO Interfaces: Ethernet (1x 10/100 Mbps Integrated PHY), USB (1x USB OTG), Serial (1x RS-232 3-wire), Digital IO (4x GPIO 3.3V), Video (1x HDMI 1.4); CoM Mode IO Interfaces: Ethernet (1x 10/100 Mbps Integrated PHY IEEE 1588 Support), USB (2x USB 2.0 Host, 1x USB OTG), Serial (2x UART), CAN bus (2x CAN bus), Digital IO (4x GPIO 3.3V support, 1x 8-key keyboard matrix), Video (1x LVDS, 1x RGB, 1x HDMI), Camera Interfaces (1x MIPI Camera, 1x CMOS Camera Optional), Audio (1x SPDIF, 1x Audio CODEC Interface), PCI Express (1x PCIe x1), I2C (1x I2C bus), SPI (1x SPI bus); Power: Input 5VDC, Consumption 2W Typ, 5W Max, Management: Eurotech Power Management (Sleep/Run/Selective Power Down/Scaling); Environment: Operating Temp: -40°C to +85°C (Extended), -20°C to +70°C (Commercial), Storage Temp: -40°C to +85°C; Certifications: Environmental (RoHS, REACH); Mechanical: Dimensions: 82mm x 50mm (LxW), CoM Connector: 2x Tyco 70 Series 100 Pin; Software: OS Support: Linux, Windows Embedded Compact
description: The CPU Ultra Low Power SBCCoM NXP iMX is a versatile embedded platform designed for a wide range of applications including retail kiosks, digital signage, medical equipment, and IoT devices. It offers configurations with single, dual, and quad-core processors, supports HD multimedia playback, and is rugged and efficient for industrial use.
summary: The CPU Ultra Low Power SBCCoM NXP iMX is a compact, low-power embedded platform with multi-core configurations, HD multimedia support, and IoT capabilities, ideal for various applications including kiosks, digital signage, and medical equipment.

name: KINODH
processor: LGA socket supports 6th/7th generation Intel Core i3/i5/i7, Pentium, Celeron processor
memory: Two 260-pin 2133 MHz Dual-Channel DDR4 SDRAM Unbuffered SODIMM slots, supported up to 32GB
io: External IO: 4 x USB 3.1 Gen 1 (5Gb/s), 2 x RS-232/422/485; Internal IO: 1 x KB/MS (1 x 6-pin), 4 x USB 2.0 (2 x 5-pin P=2.0), 2 x RS-232 (2 x 9-pin P=1.25), 1 x RS-232/422/485 (1 x 9-pin P=1.25), 2 x SATA 6Gb/s, 1 x 5V SATA power connector, 1 x 8-bit digital IO (1 x 10-pin P=2.0), 1 x Smart fan connector (1 x 4-pin), 1 x Chassis intrusion (1 x 2-pin)
thermal: Supports low power execution unit, various cooler kits available (CFX-AXR, CFX-CR, CFX-DR, CFX-ER)
feature: Dual independent displays, dual GbE LAN, M.2 SATA 6Gb/s, HD Audio, RoHS compliant, Watchdog Timer, Software Programmable support 1~255 sec. system reset
specification: Intel H110 Chipset, AMI UEFI BIOS, Intel HD Graphics Gen 9 Engines, Realtek ALC662 HD codec, Realtek RTL8111H PCIe GbE controller, Realtek RTL8111H PCIe GbE controller, 1 x PCIe x16, 1 x M.2 M key (PCIe x4), 1 x M.2 A Key (PCIe x1, USB 2.0), 1 x TPM (1 x 20-pin), 1 x SMBus (1 x 4-pin)
description: Industrial Motherboard Mini-ITX SBC supports 6th/7th Generation Intel Core i3/i5/i7, Celeron, Pentium processor, DDR4, dual independent displays, dual GbE LAN, M.2 SATA 6Gb/s, HD Audio, RoHS compliant.
summary: Mini-ITX SBC with support for 6th/7th Generation Intel processors, dual-channel DDR4, dual independent displays, dual GbE LAN, and various expansion options.

name: Wildcat PCI Single Board Computer
size: PCI compliant 106.68 mm x 174.63 mm x 20.32 mm
io: Four USB ports, one serial port, dual SATA interface, HD audio, MiniBlade socket
thermal: Extended temperature version (-40°C to +85°C), MIL-STD-810G shock and vibration
feature: High-performance video, Gigabit Ethernet, Enhanced Intel SpeedStep technology, RoHS compliant, TVS devices for ESD protection
specification: General Board Size: PCI compliant 106.68 mm x 174.63 mm x 20.32 mm, Processor: Intel Core Duo SP, Up to 2.16 GHz, FSB: 533 MHz, L2 cache: 2 MB, Chipset: GS45 ICHM, Power Requirements: 5V, System RAM: One SODIMM socket, Up to 4 GB DDR2 SDRAM, Video: Integrated high-performance video, Intel GMA 4500MHD graphics core, Analog and flat panel video interfaces, Network Interface: One autodetect 10/100/1000 Base-T port, Device IO: Four USB ports, One RS-232/422/485 selectable port, Audio: Digital HD audio via external codec, Environmental: Operating Temperature: -40°C to +85°C, Storage Temperature: -40°C to +85°C, Humidity: Less than 95% non-condensing, Vibration: MIL-STD-810G Method 514.6, Mechanical Shock: MIL-STD-810G Method 516.6, Memory: Up to 4 GB DDR2 SDRAM, Mass Storage: Dual SATA interface, One MiniBlade socket, Network Boot Option: Intel boot agent, Argon Managed Boot Agent, Software: BIOS: Phoenix Technologies Embedded BIOS, Operating Systems: Compatible with Windows, Windows Embedded, Linux, VxWorks, QNX
description: The Wildcat is an embedded single board computer featuring an Intel 2nd generation Core Duo processor. It supports PCI stackable expansion bus footprint and is designed for high reliability and long-term availability in harsh environments.
summary: The Wildcat PCI Single Board Computer is a rugged, high-performance embedded solution with Intel Core Duo processor, ideal for medical, security, defense, transportation, and industrial applications.

name: ARK Series Intel 3rd Generation Core Processor Based Fanless System
size: 230 x 64 x 133 mm (without ears), 230 x 64 x 153 mm (with ears)
form: Fanless compact embedded industrial computer chassis
io: 2x COM, 4x USB 2.0, 2x USB 3.0, 1x VGA, 1x HDMI, 1x Audio, 2x LAN, 1x DIO, 1x PCIe x1 Slot, 1x PCI Slot
thermal: Heat sink, optional FAN module
feature: Supports 24/7 operation, wide voltage input range, dual display support, easy-swap SSD and CF modules
specification: Processor: Intel 3rd Generation Core Processor, Chipset: Intel HM76, Memory: Onboard 4GB DDR3 1600 MHz, Storage: Supports 1x SSD Tray, 1x Easy-swap CF Tray, 1x mSATA socket on board, Expansion Slot: 1x Mini PCIe slot, 1x PCI slot, 1x PCIe x1 slot, Ethernet: 2x 10/100/1000 Mbps Ethernet Controller chip (Intel i210IT), USB: 4x USB 2.0 Type A, 2x USB 3.0 Type A, VGA: 1x VGA, HDMI: 1x HDMI, Serial IO: 2x DB9 RS-232/422/485 automatic flow control, Digital IO: 1x 8-ch GPIO, Audio: 1x Speaker out, 1x Mic in, Dimensions: 230 x 64 x 133 mm (without ears), 230 x 64 x 153 mm (with ears), Weight: 2.5 kg
description: The ARK Series is a fanless, compact embedded industrial computer chassis based on Intel 3rd Generation Core dual core processor. It supports 24/7 operation and features a wide voltage input range, dual display support, and easy-swap SSD and CF modules.
summary: The ARK Series is a robust, fanless embedded system designed for industrial applications, featuring Intel 3rd Generation Core processors, dual display support, and versatile I/O options.

name: TXQ
processor: Quad ARM Cortex-A9 based NXP i.MX 6Quad
memory: 1 GB DDR3 SDRAM, 128 MB SLC NAND Flash
io: Ethernet, USB, UART, SDIO, SSI, I2C, CSPI, Keypad, Ext Memory IF, IEEE 1588, CAN, PCIe, SATA, LVDS
thermal: Extended Consumer Grade: -20°C to +85°C, Industrial Grade: -40°C to +85°C, Automotive Grade: -40°C to +125°C
feature: Quad ARM Cortex-A9, Full HD LCD controller, OpenGL ES, OpenVG hardware accelerators, Multiformat HD 1080p video decoder, 1080p encoder hardware engine, Dual LVDS display port, NEON MPE coprocessor, Unified 1 MB L2 cache
specification: Quad ARM Cortex-A9, 1 GHz, 1 GB DDR3 SDRAM, 128 MB SLC NAND Flash, SODIMM form factor, 67.6 mm x 26.4 mm x 4.2 mm, Extended Consumer Grade: -20°C to +85°C, Industrial Grade: -40°C to +85°C, Automotive Grade: -40°C to +125°C
description: The TXQ is a highly integrated Computer on Module featuring a Quad ARM Cortex-A9 based NXP i.MX 6Quad processor, designed for embedded applications where size, high CPU performance, and cost are critical factors.
summary: TXQ is a compact Computer on Module with a Quad ARM Cortex-A9 processor, 1 GB DDR3 SDRAM, and 128 MB SLC NAND Flash, suitable for high-performance embedded applications.

description: The IBQ Intel Atom Qseven is a compact CPU module featuring Intel Atom processors, onboard LPDDR4 memory, and a variety of I/O interfaces. It supports wide-range operating temperatures and is suitable for industrial applications.
summary: Compact Qseven CPU module with Intel Atom processors, onboard LPDDR4 memory, and extensive I/O support, designed for industrial applications.

name: COMemRP E
frequency: P-Cores: Up to 4.8 GHz, E-Cores: Up to 3.6 GHz
io: Up to 2x Gb Ethernet TSN, 2x SATA 6Gb/s, Up to 1TB NVMe SSD, 4x PCIe, 2x DDI (DP), 1x LVDS Single Channel 18-bit, 4x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 8x USB 2.0, 2x serial interface (RX/TX), Intel High Definition Audio
thermal: Commercial temperature: 0°C to 60°C operating, -20°C to 70°C non-operating; Industrial temperature: -40°C to 85°C operating, -40°C to 85°C non-operating
feature: Optional NVMe SSD onboard, Industrial grade versions, POSCAP capacitors, vPRO/AMT/TXT/AES Support, eDP instead of LVDS
specification: COM Express Mini Pinout Type 10, Integrated SoC, Dual-Channel LPDDR5x memory, Intel Iris Xe Graphics (i7/i5 processors), Intel UHD Graphics (i3/Pentium processors), Intel I225-LM/I210-IT Ethernet Controller, ACPI Power Management, AMI Aptio V BIOS, Windows/Linux/VxWorks support
location: Kontron Europe GmbH, Gutenbergstraße 2, 85737 Ismaning, Germany
description: The COMemRP E is a COM Express Mini Type 10 module featuring Intel 13th Generation Core/Pentium Processors, up to 32 GByte LPDDR5x memory, and a variety of I/O interfaces. It is designed for industrial applications with optional NVMe SSD onboard and industrial grade versions available.
summary: COMemRP E is a high-performance COM Express Mini Type 10 module with Intel 13th Generation Core/Pentium Processors, up to 32 GByte LPDDR5x memory, and extensive I/O support, suitable for industrial applications.

io: 1x USB OTG interface, 4x USB Host interfaces, 1x PCIe x1 lane, 1x SATA Channel, 1x Gigabit Ethernet interface, 2x Serial ports, 1x CAN port

name: genuLCDD Series
size: genuLCDD: 75.8 x 53.3 x 12.5 mm, genuLCDDCLB: 75.8 x 53.3 x 12.5 mm, genuLCDDT: 75.8 x 53.3 x 12.5 mm, genuLCDDCT: 75.8 x 53.3 x 12.5 mm, genuLCDDCTCLB: 75.8 x 53.3 x 12.5 mm
memory: Banks of 32KB Flash memory for User Application Code and Data, 14KB SRAM purely for User
io: General Purpose IO pins, configurable Analog Inputs, IC channels, SPI channels, TTL Serial comm ports
thermal: Not available
feature: Powerful Intelligent LCD-TFT display module, microSD memory storage, GPIO, Communications, multiple millisecond resolution timers, Audio Generation
specification: Resolution: 320 x 240, RGB 65K true-to-life colors, TFT Screen, Non-touch, Resistive Touch, Capacitive Touch, Super Bright variants, RoHS, REACH, CE compliant
description: The gen Diablo Intelligent Display Module belongs to the latest gen range of modules designed and manufactured by D Systems. This specific gen module features a color TFT LCD with non-touch, resistive touch, and capacitive touch options, microSD memory storage, GPIO, communications, and multiple millisecond resolution timers. It is powered by the feature-rich D Labs Diablo Graphics Processor, offering a wide range of functionality options.
summary: The genuLCDD Series is a powerful intelligent LCD-TFT display module powered by the DIABLO Graphics Processor, featuring various touch options, microSD memory storage, GPIO, and multiple communication interfaces.

name: AGS GPU Server
size: D x W x H: 650 x 437 x 176 mm (25.6 x 17.2 x 6.9 inches)
processor: Dual Intel Xeon E5-2600 v3 series
memory: 16 x DDR4 2133 MHz Non-ECC/ECC/REG DIMM, maximum 512 GB
io: Front IO: 2 x USB 3.0, Rear IO: 2 x USB 3.0, 1 x PS/2, 1 x COM, 1 x VGA, 2 x RJ-45 (sharing NIC and IPMI)
thermal: Chassis Fan: 4 x 80 x 80 x 38 mm high speed fan, Air Filter
feature: Remote Management: IPMI function support, Advantech Remote Monitoring Utility
specification: Processor: Dual Intel LGA 2011 Xeon E5-2600 v3 series, Memory: 16 x DDR4 2133 MHz Non-ECC/ECC/REG DIMM, maximum 512 GB, Graphics Controller: Aspeed AST2400, VRAM: 128 MB, Expansion Slots: 4 x PCIe x16 Gen3 slots, Drive Bay: 8 x 3.5" Hot-swap, Ethernet Interface: 2 x 10/100/1000 Mbps Gigabit Ethernet Controller (1 x Intel I210-AT, 1 x Intel I210-LM), Power Supply: 1600W 80 PLUS Platinum redundant power supply
description: The AGS GPU Server is designed to support high-performance computing with dual Intel Xeon processors and multiple PCIe expansion slots for GPU cards. It features robust remote management capabilities and redundant power supplies for reliability.
summary: High-performance GPU server with dual Intel Xeon processors, multiple PCIe slots, and advanced remote management.

name: TXM TX Family Computer On Module
core: Quad ARM Cortex-A53 (Mini), Dual ARM Cortex-A53 (Nano)
memory: Up to 4GB DDR4L SDRAM, Up to 64GB eMMC
io: 1x MIPI CSI, 1x MIPI DSI, 1x LVDS, 1x PCIe, 1x Ethernet, 2x USB, 4x UART, 4x I2C, 4x SPI, 2x PWM, 1x SDIO
thermal: Industrial temperature range: -40°C to +85°C
feature: Dual/Quad ARM Cortex-A53, Display support, 1080p Video de/encode, 3D GPU, Connectivity options, OS Support: Linux, Windows IoT
specification: Highly scalable design options, Pin-compatible TX modules, Standard TXCOM pinout, High-speed communication interfaces, Onboard Ethernet PHY, On-chip USB PHY
description: The TXM family of Computer on Modules is designed for multimedia applications, featuring NXP i.MX 8M Mini/Nano processors. These modules are complete computers implemented on a board smaller than a credit card, ready for embedded systems.
summary: TXM TX Family Computer On Module with NXP i.MX 8M Mini/Nano processors, offering high performance, power efficiency, and extensive connectivity options for multimedia and industrial applications.

name: Raspberry Pi
processor: Broadcom BCM quad-core Cortex-A ARM v8 64-bit SoC
io: Dual-band 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ac wireless LAN, Bluetooth 5.0 BLE, Gigabit Ethernet, 4 USB ports, 40-pin GPIO header, 2 micro HDMI ports, microSD card slot
thermal: Not available
feature: Quad-core 64-bit processor, wireless networking, dual-display output, 4K video playback
specification: Processor: Broadcom BCM quad-core Cortex-A ARM v8 64-bit SoC 1.5 GHz, Memory: 4 GB LPDDR4, Connectivity: Dual-band 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ac wireless LAN, Bluetooth 5.0 BLE, Gigabit Ethernet, USB: 4 USB ports, GPIO: 40-pin GPIO header, Video & Sound: 2 micro HDMI ports supports 4Kp60, Multimedia: H.265 (4Kp60 decode), H.264 (1080p60 decode, 1080p30 encode), OpenGL ES 3.0 graphics, SD card support: MicroSD card slot for operating system and data storage, Keyboard: 78-key compact keyboard (depending on regional variant), Power: 5V DC via USB connector, Operating temperature: 0°C to 50°C, Dimensions: 286 mm x 122 mm x 23 mm (maximum)
description: Featuring a quad-core 64-bit processor, wireless networking, dual-display output, and 4K video playback, the Raspberry Pi is a complete personal computer built into a compact keyboard. It is ideal for surfing the web, creating and editing documents, watching videos, and learning to program using the Raspberry Pi OS desktop environment.
summary: The Raspberry Pi is a versatile single-board computer with a quad-core processor, wireless networking, dual-display output, and 4K video playback, all built into a compact keyboard.

name: COMemRP E
frequency: Base: 1.1 GHz, Turbo: 4.4 GHz (varies by SKU)
io: Up to 2x Gb Ethernet TSN, 2x SATA 6Gb/s, Up to 1 TByte NVMe SSD, 4x PCIe, 2x DDI (DP), LVDS, 4x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 8x USB 2.0, 2x serial interface (RX/TX), Intel High Definition Audio
thermal: Commercial temperature: 0°C to 60°C operating, -20°C to 80°C non-operating; Industrial temperature: -40°C to 85°C operating, -40°C to 85°C non-operating
feature: Optional NVMe SSD onboard, Industrial grade versions, POSCAP capacitors, vPRO/AMT/TXT/AES Support, eDP instead of LVDS
specification: COM Express Mini Pinout Type 10, Intel 13th Generation Core family, Integrated SoC, Dual-Channel LPDDR5x memory, Intel Iris Xe Graphics (i7/i5 processors), Intel UHD Graphics (i3/Pentium processors), Intel I225-LM/I210-IT Ethernet Controller, ACPI Power Management, AMI Aptio V BIOS, Windows/Linux/VxWorks support
location: Kontron Europe GmbH, Gutenbergstraße 2, 85737 Ismaning, Germany
description: The COMemRP E is a COM Express Mini Type 10 module featuring Intel 13th Generation Core/Pentium Processors, up to 16 GByte LPDDR5x memory, and a variety of I/O interfaces. It is designed for industrial applications with optional NVMe SSD onboard and industrial grade versions available.
summary: COMemRP E is a versatile COM Express Mini Type 10 module with Intel 13th Generation Core/Pentium Processors, up to 16 GByte LPDDR5x memory, and extensive I/O support, suitable for industrial applications.

name: Renesas GUL AUL FIVE SoC based OSM LGA Module
core: 4x Arm Cortex-A55 @ 1.6GHz, 2x Arm Cortex-M33 @ 200MHz, 1x RISC-V AX45MP @ 1.0GHz
memory: Up to 8GB DDR4 Memory, eMMC Flash 8GB Expandable
io: RGMII x1, USB 2.0 x2, SDIO x1, QSPI x1, SPI x1, CAN x1, I2C x1, MIPI CSI x1, UART x2, PWM x2, GPIOs
thermal: Industrial grade operating temperature support (-40°C to 85°C)
feature: Linux OS Support, Power Input 3.3V/5V, DA9063 PMIC, eMMC Flash 8GB Expandable, General Features Power Input Operating Temperature -40°C to 85°C
specification: OSM v1.0 Size-S LGA Module, 30mm x 30mm form factor, up to 8GB DDR4 Memory, eMMC Flash 8GB Expandable, RGMII x1, USB 2.0 x2, SDIO x1, QSPI x1, SPI x1, CAN x1, I2C x1, MIPI CSI x1, UART x2, PWM x2, GPIOs, Industrial grade operating temperature support (-40°C to 85°C), Linux OS Support, DA9063 PMIC
description: The Renesas GUL AUL FIVE SoC based OSM LGA modules are designed per Open Standard Module Size-S Specification (OSM). This module integrates one of three Renesas SoCs (GUL, AUL, FIVE) and is aimed at offering application portability and a wide variety of applications.
summary: Renesas GUL AUL FIVE SoC based OSM LGA Module designed for industrial applications with up to 8GB DDR4 memory, multiple I/O interfaces, and industrial grade operating temperature support.

name: Advantech ASMB-TA
memory: DDR4 ECC REG 2666 MHz, up to 768GB LRDIMM or 384GB RDIMM
io: Multiple PCIe slots, USB ports, SATA connectors, VGA, LAN ports
thermal: CPU cooler purchased separately
feature: Dual Intel Xeon Scalable processors, multiple PCIe slots, dual GbE ports, IPMI support
specification: Form Factor: Proprietary, Processor: Dual Intel Xeon Scalable, Memory: DDR4 ECC REG 2666 MHz, Expansion Slots: Multiple PCIe slots, Storage: SATA and SAS support, Networking: Dual GbE ports, Onboard I/O: USB, VGA, LAN, Management: Out of band remote management, Monitoring: CPU temperature, System monitoring, Watchdog timer
description: Proprietary server board supporting dual Intel Xeon Scalable processors, DDR4 ECC REG memory, multiple PCIe slots, and dual GbE ports.
summary: Advantech ASMB-TA is a proprietary server board designed for high-performance computing with dual Intel Xeon Scalable processors, extensive memory support, and robust I/O options.

name: Smartcat BL
io: Digital IO, Analog IO, Serial Ports, Ethernet Port
thermal: Not available
feature: Built-in digital and analog IO, Ethernet connectivity, compact form factor, optional plastic enclosure, LCD-keypad module
specification: Microprocessor: Rabbit running at MHz, Static RAM: K, Flash Memory: K, Ethernet Port: BaseT, Digital Inputs: 12, Digital Outputs: 12, Analog Inputs: 11-bit resolution, Analog Outputs: 4-bit resolution, Serial Ports: 4 (RS, RS, RS, CMOS-compatible programming port), Real-Time Clock, Watchdog Supervisor
description: The Smartcat BL is a high-performance C-programmable single board computer with built-in digital and analog IO combined with Ethernet connectivity in a compact form factor. It features a Rabbit microprocessor operating at MHz for fast data processing.
summary: Smartcat BL is a high-performance, C-programmable single board computer with digital and analog IO, Ethernet connectivity, and a Rabbit microprocessor.

name: iMX M Plus OSMLF LGA Module
io: RGMII, USB OTG, USB Host, PCIe, MIPI CSI, HDMI, LVDS, MIPI DSI, Audio, SPI, UART, SD, CAN, I2C, JTAG, GPIO
thermal: Heat sink recommended
feature: WiFi, Bluetooth, RTC Controller, USB Hub
specification: OSM v1.0 compliant, supports various interfaces including RGMII, USB, PCIe, MIPI CSI, HDMI, LVDS, MIPI DSI, Audio, SPI, UART, SD, CAN, I2C, JTAG, GPIO
location: 7/B, 29th Main, BTM Layout 2nd Stage, Bengaluru, Karnataka, India
description: The iMX M Plus OSMLF LGA Module is a compact, high-performance embedded computer module based on NXP's i.MX 8M Plus applications processor. It supports a wide range of interfaces and is designed for low-cost, high-performance applications.
summary: Compact, high-performance embedded computer module with NXP i.MX 8M Plus processor, supporting a wide range of interfaces.

name: CM Sensing V
size: L x W x H mm
io: Gigabit Ethernet, WiFi, Bluetooth, 4x RS232, 1x RS485, CAN Bus, HDMI, USB Type-A, USB micro-B, Mini PCIe, SIM Slot, SD Slot
thermal: Full-face CNC aluminum alloy heat sink
feature: Supports Raspberry Pi Compute Module, external WiFi/BT antenna, optional 4G LTE module, real-time clock, buzzer, multiple mounting options (DIN, wall mount)
specification: CPU: BCM, 4 cores ARM Cortex-A72, 1.5 GHz, Memory: 1GB, 2GB, 4GB, 8GB options; eMMC: 8GB, 16GB, 32GB options, Ethernet: 1x Gigabit Ethernet, WiFi: Dual-band 2.4GHz/5GHz, Bluetooth: 5.0, 4G LTE: Quectel EC25, HDMI: 1x standard HDMI, USB: 2x USB Type-A, 1x USB micro-B, Mini PCIe: 1x, SIM Slot: 1x, SD Slot: 1x, CAN Bus: 1x, RS232: 4x, RS485: 1x, RTC: 1x, Buzzer: 1x, Power Input: 12V (9-24V) or 24V (18-36V), Dimensions: L x W x H mm, Case: Full Metal Jacket, Cooling: Full-face CNC aluminum alloy heat sink
location: Room 210, Building 1, No. 38 Jialuo Highway, Jiading District, Shanghai
description: CM Sensing V is an embedded computer designed for IoT and industrial field data acquisition applications. It leverages the Raspberry Pi Compute Module to provide a flexible and reliable solution for various industrial and IoT applications.
summary: CM Sensing V is an embedded computer based on the Raspberry Pi Compute Module, designed for IoT and industrial data acquisition with robust connectivity options and flexible mounting solutions.

name: CPU COM Express Compact Type Rugged Intel Xeon D
memory: 8GB DDR4 ECC Memory Down, 2400 MT/s, 1x DDR4 ECC SODIMM up to 16GB
io: 4x SATA 6Gb/s, 4x USB 3.0, 7x USB 2.0, 1x UART TX/RX, 8x Digital I/O, 1x PCIe x16 Gen3, 8x PCIe x1 Gen3
thermal: Fanless design, CPU TDP up to 45W
feature: Hybrid RAM Architecture, Rugged Fanless Design, Customizable, Professional Services
specification: IEC 61508 Safety Integrity Compliant, RoHS EU, PICMG COM Express R2.1 Type 6
description: The CPU COM Express module combines high performance with a truly embedded CPU and innovative hybrid RAM architecture, offering ruggedness with soldered memory and expandability with SODIMMs. It supports the latest generation of embedded Intel Pentium and Xeon D CPUs, delivering server-class performance in a compact, fanless design.
summary: High-performance, rugged COM Express Compact Type 6 module with Intel Xeon D/Pentium D CPUs, hybrid RAM architecture, and extensive I/O options.

name: CM Media
memory: 2GB, 4GB, 8GB LPDDR4; eMMC flash: 8GB, 16GB, 32GB; SD card: 8GB, 16GB, 32GB; SSD: 8GB, 16GB, 32GB
io: Front Panel: Power Input (Type-C), HDMI, MicroHDMI, Micro SD Card, SIM Slot; Right Panel: USB, USB, Headset (3.5mm Jack), Gigabit Ethernet; Rear Panel: Onboard Microphone, Speaker, Camera (optional), Switch Button, Antenna (WiFi/BT optional, 4G optional); Internal Interface: Mini PCIe, RTC
thermal: Solves heat dissipation problem
feature: Supports dual speaker playback, microphone, 3.5mm headphone jack, equipped with SONY IMX219 eight-megapixel sensor, supports dual-band WiFi and Bluetooth, optional 4G module, CNC cutting aluminum alloy shell
specification: CPU: BCM, ARM Cortex-A, 1.5 GHz, 4 cores; Memory: 2GB, 4GB, 8GB LPDDR4; eMMC flash: 8GB, 16GB, 32GB; SD card: 8GB, 16GB, 32GB; SSD: 8GB, 16GB, 32GB; Ethernet: 1x Gigabit Ethernet; WiFi: Dual-band; Bluetooth; HDMI: 1x standard HDMI, 1x MicroHDMI; USB: 2x USB Type A; Mini PCIe: 1 lane PCIe; RTC: 1x RTC; Speaker: 2x Speaker; Microphone: 1x Microphone; LED indicator: Blue LED power indicator, status indicator; Power input: 5V/3A; Dimensions: length x width x height (not specified); Case: CNC cutting aluminum alloy shell
location: Room 210, Building 1, No. 38 Jialuo Highway, Jiading District, Shanghai
description: EDCMMEDIA is a multimedia computer based on the Raspberry Pi Compute Module (CM). It makes full use of the CM's structural flexibility to solve heat dissipation problems, improve wireless communication reliability with an external WiFi/BT antenna, and support dual speaker playback and a microphone. It is equipped with a SONY IMX219 eight-megapixel sensor to meet daily photo requirements.
summary: CM Media is a small multimedia desktop computer based on the Raspberry Pi Compute Module, featuring robust connectivity options, dual speaker playback, and a high-quality camera sensor.

feature: Wireless networking, dual-display output, 4K video playback, compact keyboard
specification: Processor: Broadcom BCM quad-core Cortex-A ARM v8 64-bit SoC 1.5 GHz, Memory: 4 GB LPDDR4, Connectivity: Dual-band 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ac wireless LAN, Bluetooth 5.0 BLE, Gigabit Ethernet, USB: 4 USB ports, GPIO: 40-pin GPIO header, Video & Sound: 2 micro HDMI ports supporting 4Kp60, Multimedia: H.265 (4Kp60 decode), H.264 (1080p60 decode, 1080p30 encode), OpenGL ES 3.0 graphics, Storage: MicroSD card slot for operating system and data storage, Keyboard: 78-key compact keyboard (depending on regional variant), Power: 5V DC via USB connector, Operating temperature: 0°C to 50°C, Dimensions: 286 mm x 122 mm x 23 mm (maximum)
description: Featuring a quad-core 64-bit processor, wireless networking, dual-display output, and 4K video playback, the Raspberry Pi is a complete personal computer built into a compact keyboard. It is ideal for surfing the web, creating and editing documents, watching videos, and learning to program using the Raspberry Pi OS desktop environment.
summary: The Raspberry Pi is a versatile single-board computer with a quad-core processor, wireless networking, dual-display output, and 4K video playback, all built into a compact keyboard.

name: AIMB Server Board
memory: Dual Channel DDR4 2933 MHz SDRAM, Max Capacity 64GB (32GB per SODIMM Socket)
io: DP, HDMI, Ethernet, USB 3.2 Gen 1, USB 2.0, Audio Line in/Line out/Mic, Serial RS232, SATA III, GPIO 8-bit
thermal: Smart Fan, CPU cooler options available
feature: Supports Intel vPro, AMT, Software RAID, TPM, dual channel 2W amplifier, SUSI, WISE-DeviceOn, Edge AI Suite
specification: Processor System: Intel 10th Gen Core i3/i5/i7/i9, Chipset: Intel Q470E, BIOS: AMI EFI 128Mbit SPI, Expansion Slot: M.2 x1 (M key, E key), PCIe x1 Gen3, Memory: Dual Channel DDR4 2933 MHz SDRAM, Max Capacity 64GB, Graphics: Intel HD Graphics, HDMI, DP, LVDs, eDP, VGA, Ethernet: 2x GbE LAN (Intel i219LM, Intel I210AT), SATA: 2x SATA III, USB: USB 3.2 Gen 1, USB 2.0, Audio: Line in/Line out/Mic, Internal Connector: USB 3.2 Gen 1, USB 2.0, Serial RS232, GPIO 8-bit, Watchdog Timer, Power Requirements: Boost 60W, Typical 35W, Environment: Non-Operating Temperature -40°C to 85°C, Physical Characteristics: 170mm x 170mm
description: The AIMB Server Board is a Mini-ITX motherboard supporting Intel 10th Gen Core processors, designed for high-performance computing with extensive I/O options and advanced features like Intel vPro, AMT, and Software RAID.
summary: AIMB Server Board is a high-performance Mini-ITX motherboard supporting Intel 10th Gen Core processors with extensive I/O options and advanced features.

name: Advantech ASMB-TA
memory: DDR4 ECC REG 2666 MHz, up to 768GB LRDIMM or 384GB RDIMM
io: Multiple PCIe slots, USB ports, SATA connectors, VGA, LAN ports
thermal: CPU cooler purchased separately, system fan headers
feature: Dual Intel Xeon Scalable processors, ECC memory support, multiple PCIe slots, dual GbE ports, IPMI
specification: Form Factor: Proprietary, Processor: Dual Intel Xeon Scalable, Memory: DDR4 ECC REG 2666 MHz, up to 768GB LRDIMM or 384GB RDIMM, Expansion Slots: Multiple PCIe slots, Storage: SATA and SAS support, Networking: Dual GbE LAN ports, Onboard I/O: USB, VGA, LAN, Serial ports, Management: Out-of-band remote management, monitoring, watchdog timer
description: The Advantech ASMB-TA is a proprietary server board designed for dual Intel Xeon Scalable processors, supporting up to 768GB of DDR4 ECC memory, multiple PCIe slots, and dual GbE ports. It is suitable for high-performance server applications.
summary: Advantech ASMB-TA is a high-performance proprietary server board with dual Intel Xeon Scalable processors, extensive memory support, and multiple expansion options.

specification: CPU: BCM2837, 4 cores, 1.2 GHz; Memory: 1GB, 2GB, 4GB, 8GB RAM options; Storage: 8GB, 16GB, 32GB, 64GB eMMC options, microSD card support; Ethernet: Dual Gigabit Ethernet; Wireless: Dual-band WiFi, Bluetooth, LTE module support; Interfaces: HDMI, USB, ADC, RS232, RS485, Isolated DI, Relay, SPI Flash, RTC, Buzzer, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, miniPCIe, UART, GPIO, microUSB, PoE; Power Input: 12V DC (9V-24V for V1.0, 9V-36V for V2.0); Operating Temperature: -20°C to 70°C; Storage Temperature: -40°C to 85°C; Humidity: 5% to 95% non-condensing
location: Room 101, Building 1, No. 123 Jialuo Highway, Jiading District, Shanghai, China
description: CM Industrial is an industrial embedded computer based on the Raspberry Pi Compute Module, designed for IoT gateway, industrial control, advertising display, and intelligent manufacturing applications.
summary: CM Industrial V is an industrial embedded computer featuring the Raspberry Pi Compute Module, offering extensive communication interfaces, dual-band WiFi, Bluetooth, LTE support, and robust power input options for various industrial applications.

name: SOM th Gen Intel Xeon Core Processors COM Express Basic Module
frequency: Base Frequency: 1.6 GHz, Max Single Core Turbo Frequency: 3.4 GHz
memory: Dual channel DDR4, Max 32GB, ECC optional
io: PCIe x16, PCIe x1, USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATA, Intel I219-LM Ethernet, Intel I210-AT Ethernet, HD Audio, LPC, SMBus, I2C, SPI, GPIO, COM Port, TPM
thermal: Active cooling solution
feature: Supports three independent symmetrical displays, Flexible IO support, iManager, WISE-PaaS/RMM, Embedded Software APIs
specification: Compliance: COM Express R3.0 Type 6 pinout, BIOS: AMI UEFI 128Mbit, Graphics: Intel Gen9 low power graphics, Display: VGA, LCD, DDI, Multiple Display, PCI Express: x16 Gen3, x1 Gen2, Audio: Intel HD Audio, Ethernet: Intel I219-LM 10/100/1000 Mbps, Intel I210-AT 10/100/1000 Mbps, USB: USB 3.0, USB 2.0, SATA: SATA Gen3, SPI Bus, GPIO, Watchdog, COM Port, TPM: Infineon SLB9670 optional, Smart Fan
description: The SOM th Gen Intel Xeon Core Processors COM Express Basic Module is designed for high-performance computing applications, offering flexible IO support and multiple display configurations.
summary: High-performance COM Express Basic Module with Intel Xeon/Core processors, supporting up to 32GB DDR4 memory, multiple display outputs, and extensive IO options.

name: Liger PC Embedded Computer
io: Two USB 3.0, four USB 2.0, two RS-232, two RS-485, eight TTL I/O lines, SPI, I2C, dual Gigabit Ethernet, dual Mini DisplayPort
thermal: Fanless operation, heat plate, optional heat sink and heat pipe adaptors
feature: Trusted Platform Module (TPM), Intel Active Management Technology (AMT), MIL-STD-810G qualified for high shock and vibration environments, fanless operation, industrial temperature operation
specification: MIL-STD-810G qualified, supports Windows, Linux, VxWorks, QNX, up to 32 GB DDR4 memory, dual Gigabit Ethernet, dual Mini DisplayPort, multiple USB and serial ports, SPI, I2C, TPM, AMT, fanless operation
description: The Liger high-performance embedded computer combines Intel's 7th Generation Core Kaby Lake processor with traditional PC/104 expansion interface, providing a powerful and reliable solution for OEM applications requiring high reliability and long-term availability.
summary: High-performance embedded computer with Intel 7th Gen Core Kaby Lake processor, PC/104 expansion, fanless operation, and extensive I/O options, designed for high reliability and long-term availability.

name: genuLCDD Series
size: NonTouch: 75.8 x 53.3 x 6.3 mm, Resistive Touch: 75.8 x 53.3 x 6.3 mm, Capacitive Touch: 75.8 x 53.3 x 6.3 mm
io: Up to 16 GPIO pins, 3 SPI channels, 3 I2C channels, 3 TTL Serial ports
thermal: Not available
feature: Powerful Intelligent LCD/TFT display module, Audio playback support, microSD memory card support, FAT file system, RF EMI Shielding support
specification: Resolution: 320 x 240, RGB 65K true-to-life colors, 4-wire Resistive Touch Panel, Capacitive Touch Panel, 3.3V tolerant GPIO, PWM Audio pin, 3.6V to 6.0V operation, RoHS, REACH, CE compliant
description: The genuLCDD Series is a range of intelligent display modules designed for ease of integration and use, featuring a DIABLO Graphics Processor, various touch options, and extensive I/O capabilities.
summary: The genuLCDD Series offers powerful intelligent display modules with DIABLO Graphics Processor, multiple touch options, and extensive I/O capabilities, designed for easy integration and use.

name: PCM-3350
io: Ethernet, USB, Serial COM, GPIO, VGA, IDE, PS/2, LPT
thermal: Passive cooling
feature: Ultra Low Power, Dual Ethernet, CompactFlash, Extended Temperature Support
specification: Processor: DMP Vortex86DX 800 MHz, Memory: Onboard 256 MB DDR2 SDRAM, Display: VGA, 18-bit LVDS, 24-bit TTL, Ethernet: 10/100 Mbps, Storage: CompactFlash Type III, IDE, SATA, I/O: USB, Serial COM, GPIO, VGA, IDE, PS/2, LPT, Power: Single +5V, Power Consumption: Typical 5W, Max 6W, Operating Temperature: -40°C to 85°C
description: The PCM-3350 is an ultra-low power single board computer featuring the DMP Vortex86DX processor, onboard memory, dual Ethernet, and support for extended temperature ranges. It is designed for embedded applications requiring reliable performance in harsh environments.
summary: Ultra-low power SBC with DMP Vortex86DX processor, onboard memory, dual Ethernet, and extended temperature support.

name: PCE-5131
processor: Intel 6th Generation Core i3/i5/i7, Pentium, Celeron
frequency: 2.7 GHz, 2.4 GHz, 2.2 GHz, 2.0 GHz, 1.8 GHz, 1.6 GHz
memory: Dual Channel Non-ECC DDR4, Max Capacity 32GB (16GB per DIMM Socket), 2 x 260-pin DDR4 SODIMM
io: Front IO: VGA, HDMI, Ethernet, 4 x USB 3.0, 2 x USB 2.0, Audio Line-out, Mic-in; Internal Connectors: 4 x USB 2.0, 2 x RS-232, 2 x RS-232/422/485, 1 x PCIe x1, 1 x mPCIe, 1 x mSATA, 1 x GPIO
thermal: Operating Temperature: 0 ~ 60°C (32 ~ 140°F) depends on CPU speed and system thermal solution; Non-Operating Temperature: -40 ~ 85°C (-40 ~ 185°F); Humidity: 95% @ 60°C (non-condensing)
feature: Supports up to 3 independent displays, NVMe M.2, Watchdog Timer, TPM module support, Embedded OS support
specification: Intel 6th Generation Processor, LGA 1151 socket, Intel Q170/H110 chipset, AMI 128Mbit SPI BIOS, Dual Channel Non-ECC DDR4, Max Capacity 32GB, 2 x 260-pin DDR4 SODIMM, VGA up to 1920x1200 @ 60Hz, HDMI up to 4096x2160 @ 24Hz, DP up to 4096x2160 @ 60Hz via optional cable, 3 independent displays, Intel I219LM/I210AT Ethernet, 2 x RJ45, SATA 3.0, RAID 0/1/5/10, 4 x USB 3.0, 6 x USB 2.0, 6 x RS-232, 2 x RS-232/422/485, 1 x PCIe x1, 1 x mPCIe, 1 x mSATA, GPIO, Watchdog Timer, TPM module support, Embedded OS support
description: The PCE-5131 is an industrial motherboard designed for high-performance computing with support for Intel 6th Generation Core i3/i5/i7, Pentium, and Celeron processors. It features multiple I/O interfaces, dual-channel DDR4 memory, and support for up to 3 independent displays.
summary: Advantech PCE-5131 is an industrial motherboard supporting Intel 6th Generation processors, dual-channel DDR4 memory, multiple I/O interfaces, and up to 3 independent displays.

name: CM Sensing V
size: L x W x H mm
io: Gigabit Ethernet, WiFi, Bluetooth, 4x RS232, 1x CAN Bus, 1x HDMI, 1x USB Type-A, 1x USB micro-B, 1x Mini PCIe, 1x Micro SD card slot, 1x SIM slot
thermal: Full-face CNC aluminum alloy heat sink
feature: Supports Raspberry Pi OS, dual storage scheme (eMMC and micro SD card), external WiFi/BT and 4G antennas, RTC, buzzer, PWM dimming, DSI support
specification: CPU: BCM, 4 cores ARM Cortex-A72, 1.5 GHz, Memory: 2GB, 4GB, 8GB LPDDR4, eMMC 8GB, 16GB, 32GB, Ethernet: 1x Gigabit Ethernet, WiFi: 2.4GHz/5GHz dual-band, Bluetooth: 5.0, 4G LTE: Quectel EC25, HDMI: 1x standard HDMI, USB: 1x USB Type-A, 1x USB micro-B, Mini PCIe: 1x, Micro SD card slot: 1x, SIM slot: 1x, RTC: 1x, Buzzer: 1x, Power input: 5V, 12V, Dimensions: L x W x H mm, Case: Full Metal Jacket, Cooling: Full-face CNC aluminum alloy heat sink
location: Room 210, Building 1, No. 38 Jialuo Highway, Jiading District, Shanghai
description: CM Sensing V is an embedded computer based on the Raspberry Pi Compute Module, designed for IoT and industrial field data acquisition applications. It features a flexible structure to solve heat dissipation problems and improve wireless communication reliability with external WiFi/BT antennas.
summary: CM Sensing V is an embedded computer designed for IoT and industrial field data acquisition, featuring a BCM processor, multiple I/O interfaces, and robust thermal management.

name: AIMB Industrial Motherboard
processor: Intel Core i3/i5/i7, Pentium G, Celeron G
frequency: 3.3 GHz, 3.1 GHz, 2.9 GHz, 2.7 GHz, 2.5 GHz, 2.3 GHz, 2.1 GHz, 1.8 GHz
memory: Dual Channel DDR3 1333/1066 MHz SDRAM, Max Capacity 16 GB (8 GB per DIMM)
io: Rear IO: CRT, DVI, Ethernet, USB 2.0 x 4, USB 3.0 x 2, Parallel, Audio (Mic-in, Line-out), Serial (PS/2 keyboard, PS/2 mouse); Internal Connector: USB 2.0 x 4, USB 3.0 x 2, Serial x 6 (RS-232 x 4, RS-232/422/485 x 2), IDE, SATA x 4, LVDS, Inverter, IrDA, GPIO (8-bit)
thermal: Depends on CPU speed and cooler solution
feature: Supports Intel Core i3/i5/i7 processor, H61 chipset, Two DIMM sockets support 16 GB DDR3 1333/1066 MHz SDRAM, Supports dual display (VGA, DVI, LVDS), Two GbE LAN, Supports COM, LPT, TPM (Optional), Supports USB 2.0, USB 3.0, SUSIAccess, McAfee, Acronis, Embedded Software APIs
specification: Processor System: CPU Intel Core i3/i5/i7, Pentium G, Celeron G; Core Number: Not available; Max Speed: 3.3 GHz, 3.1 GHz, 2.9 GHz, 2.7 GHz, 2.5 GHz, 2.3 GHz, 2.1 GHz, 1.8 GHz; Integrated Graphics: Yes; L Cache: 3 MB, 4 MB, 6 MB, 8 MB; Chipset: H61; BIOS: AMI EFI 64 Mbit SPI; Expansion Slot: PCI 32-bit 33 MHz slots x 2, PCIe x1 Gen2 500 MB/s per direction slot x 1, PCIe x16 Gen2 8 GB/s per direction slot x 1; Memory Technology: Dual Channel DDR3 1333/1066 MHz SDRAM; Max Capacity: 16 GB (8 GB per DIMM); Graphics Controller: Intel HD Graphics; VRAM: 1 GB maximum shared memory (2 GB system memory installed); LVDS: Supports dual channel 18/24-bit 1920 x 1200; CRT: Yes, supports max resolution 2048 x 1536; DVI: AE sku; Dual Display: CRT+LVDS, CRT+DVI, CRT+CRT; Ethernet Interface: 10/100/1000 Mbps; Controller: GbE LAN Realtek 8111E; Connector: RJ-45 x 2; SATA: Max Data Transfer Rate 300 MB/s; SATA Channel: 4; Rear IO: CRT, DVI (AE sku), Ethernet, USB 2.0 x 4, USB 3.0 x 2, Parallel, Audio (Mic-in, Line-out), Serial (PS/2 keyboard, PS/2 mouse); Internal Connector: USB 2.0 x 4, USB 3.0 x 2, Serial x 6 (RS-232 x 4, RS-232/422/485 x 2), IDE, SATA x 4, LVDS, Inverter, IrDA, GPIO (8-bit); Watchdog Timer: Output System reset, Interval Programmable 1-255 sec/min; Power Requirements: Intel Core i7-3770 3.4 GHz, 4 GB DDR3 1333 MHz x 2 pcs, Power On: 5V 5.5A, 12V 1.5A, 5VSB 0.1A; Environment: Operating Temperature 0-60°C (32-140°F) depends on CPU speed and cooler solution, Non-Operating Temperature -40-85°C (-40-185°F); Physical Characteristics: Dimensions 244 mm x 244 mm
description: The AIMB Industrial Motherboard supports Intel Core i3/i5/i7 processors and H61 chipset, providing robust performance and versatile connectivity options for industrial applications.
summary: AIMB Industrial Motherboard with Intel Core i3/i5/i7 support, dual display, dual GbE LAN, and extensive I/O options.

name: EDIPC Series
processor: Broadcom BCM quad core Cortex-A ARM v8 64-bit SoC
voltage: Wide voltage power input range DC 9V-36V
io: Dual LANs (2x Gigabit Ethernet, 1x 100M Ethernet), multiple RS ports, HDMI, USB, Micro SD card slot, Nano SIM card slot, GPIO, CSI, DSI, Audio In/Stereo Out
thermal: Not available
feature: High reliability, industrial-grade, wide temperature range, integrated supercapacitor-backup power supply, RTC, Watch Dog, EEPROM crypto authentication, high-quality metal case, DIN-rail installation
specification: Supports Raspberry Pi OS (Desktop and Lite, 32-bit and 64-bit), multiple storage options (eMMC, Micro SD, NVMe SSD), various I/O interfaces, wide voltage input, electrostatic surge protection, reverse polarity protection, overvoltage protection, overcurrent protection
description: High Reliability Industrial Computer based on Raspberry Pi CM, featuring a Broadcom BCM quad core Cortex-A ARM v8 64-bit SoC, up to 8GB LPDDR4 RAM, and various I/O interfaces. Suitable for industrial applications with wide temperature range and robust power protection features.
summary: EDIPC Series is a high reliability industrial computer based on Raspberry Pi CM, offering robust performance with a Broadcom BCM quad core Cortex-A ARM v8 64-bit SoC, up to 8GB LPDDR4 RAM, and extensive I/O options. It is designed for industrial environments with wide temperature range and comprehensive power protection.

name: Advantech AIMB-785GA / AIMB-785VGA
processor: Intel 12th/13th Generation Core i3/i5/i7/i9, Pentium, Celeron
memory: Dual Channel Non-ECC DDR4, Max Capacity 64GB, 2 x 288-pin DIMM sockets
io: VGA, HDMI, 2 x LAN (1GbE), 4 x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 6 x USB 2.0, 6 x COM (2 x RS-232, 4 x RS-232/422/485), Audio Line-out, Mic-in
thermal: Depends on CPU speed and system thermal solution
feature: Dual display (HDMI/VGA), Dual GbE LAN, PCIe x16 Gen 3, PCIe x4 Gen 3, PCI expansion slots, TPM 2.0 support, Watchdog Timer, GPIO
specification: Supports Intel 12th/13th Generation Core i3/i5/i7/i9, Pentium, Celeron processors, Intel H610E chipset, AMI 128Mbit SPI Flash BIOS, Integrated Intel UHD Graphics, 2 x 288-pin DIMM sockets, Dual Channel Non-ECC DDR4, Max Capacity 64GB, 2 x LAN (1GbE), 4 x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 6 x USB 2.0, 6 x COM (2 x RS-232, 4 x RS-232/422/485), Audio Line-out, Mic-in, PCIe x16 Gen 3, PCIe x4 Gen 3, PCI expansion slots, TPM 2.0 support, Watchdog Timer, GPIO
description: The Advantech AIMB-785GA / AIMB-785VGA is an industrial motherboard designed for high-performance computing applications. It supports Intel 12th/13th Generation Core i3/i5/i7/i9, Pentium, and Celeron processors, and offers a range of I/O interfaces and expansion slots for versatile connectivity and functionality.
summary: Advantech AIMB-785GA / AIMB-785VGA is an ATX industrial motherboard supporting Intel 12th/13th Generation processors, with dual display, dual GbE LAN, and extensive I/O and expansion options.

name: WAFER-EHL
frequency: 2.0 GHz base frequency, 2.6 GHz turbo frequency
io: 2x HDMI, 2x DP, 1x IEI iDPM slot, 4x USB 3.2 Gen 2, 2x SATA 6Gb/s, 2x Intel I210-AT GbE LAN, 1x M.2 A key, 1x M.2 B key, 1x RS-232, 1x RS-422/485, 1x iAUDIO
thermal: IEI Heat Conduction Casing (IHCC), active and passive cooling options
feature: Triple independent display support, PCIe Gen 3 x4 slot, dual GbE LAN, onboard LPDDR4x memory, wide operating temperature range
specification: Supports Intel Elkhart Lake Atom, Pentium, and Celeron processors, onboard LPDDR4x 8GB memory, triple display output (2x HDMI, 2x DP, 1x IEI iDPM slot), dual Intel I210-AT GbE LAN, multiple USB and SATA interfaces, PCIe expansion slots, wide operating temperature range (-20°C to 60°C)
description: The WAFER-EHL is a high-performance single board computer designed for industrial applications, featuring Intel Elkhart Lake processors, onboard LPDDR4x memory, and extensive I/O options.
summary: High-performance SBC with Intel Elkhart Lake processors, onboard LPDDR4x memory, triple display support, and extensive I/O options.

name: RevPi Core S
io: 4x USB A, 1x RJ45 Ethernet, 1x MicroUSB (solely for image transfer), 1x Micro HDMI, 1x PiBridge system bus, 1x 4-pole screw-type terminal (power supply)
thermal: Passive heat sink
feature: Compatible with all RevPi IO modules and RevPi Gateway modules connected via PiBridge system bus, ESD protection, EMI tests, Surge and Burst tests, RTC, Optical indicator, CE, RoHS, UL certification
specification: Housing dimensions: Not available, Housing type: EN Polycarbonate, Weight: approx. 200 g, Protection class: IP20, Max power consumption: 4 W (including 500 mA total USB load), Operating temperature: -40°C to 55°C, Storage temperature: -40°C to 85°C, Humidity: 93% non-condensing, Total current consumption: USB sockets max 500 mA, Conformity: CE, RoHS, UL certification, ESD protection: 4 kV, EMI tests: Passed according to EN 61000-6-2, Surge tests: Passed according to EN 61000-6-2, Burst tests: Passed according to EN 61000-6-2, Buffer time: min. 10 h, Status LEDs: bicolor, two freely programmable, UL File No: E494534
description: The RevPi Core S is a robust and versatile single board computer designed for industrial applications. It features a quad-core ARM Cortex-A7 processor, 1 GB of RAM, and a variety of I/O interfaces, making it suitable for a wide range of automation and control tasks.
summary: RevPi Core S is an industrial single board computer with a Broadcom BCM2837 quad-core ARM Cortex-A7 processor, 1 GB RAM, and multiple I/O interfaces, designed for robust and versatile automation and control applications.

name: CONDOR Embedded Processing Unit
io: Two USB 3.0 ports, four USB 2.0 ports, two RS-232/422/485 serial ports, two Gigabit Ethernet ports, two Mini DisplayPort outputs, one dual-channel LVDS video output, eight TTL I/O lines, one SATA 6 Gbps port
thermal: Heat plate standard, optional heat sink, fan, and heat pipe thermal accessories available
feature: TPM security chip, AES instructions, Hyper-Threading, wide input voltage range, reverse voltage protection, RF noise filtering, transient voltage protection, MIL-STD-810G compliance
specification: 95 x 95 x 37 mm, Intel Core Skylake processors, up to 32 GB DDR4 RAM, 8 to 30 VDC input, TPM security chip, MIL-STD-810G compliance, various I/O interfaces
description: The Condor is a compact, high-performance embedded computer designed to meet the evolving requirements of smaller, lighter, and lower power embedded systems. It features Intel Skylake processors, TPM security, and a wide range of I/O interfaces, making it suitable for rugged and industrial applications.
summary: The Condor Embedded Processing Unit is a rugged, high-performance computer featuring Intel Skylake processors, TPM security, and a variety of I/O interfaces, designed for industrial and harsh environments.

name: MIO Extension SBCs Modules
processor: Intel Atom E, Intel Celeron N
memory: DDR3L 1333 MHz, Max Capacity 8 GB, 1 x 204-pin SODIMM
io: Rich IO interface: COM, SATA, USB, GPIO, SMBus, IC, MIOe expansion interface
thermal: Passive cooling
feature: Supports SUSIAccess Embedded Software APIs, Dual Independent display, Flexible design using integrated multiple IO MIOe approach
specification: Processor: Intel Atom E, Intel Celeron N; Frequency: 1.58 GHz (Dual-Core), 2.16 GHz (Quad-Core); Memory: DDR3L 1333 MHz, Max Capacity 8 GB, 1 x 204-pin SODIMM; Display: Single channel 18/24-bit LVDS, VGA, DP/HDMI; Ethernet: Intel I210, 10/100/1000 Mbps; Audio: Realtek ALC892 High Definition Audio; Storage: mSATA, SATA 3.0 Gbps; Expansion: Mini PCI Express x1 Full-size, MIOe; Power: Single 12V DC power input; Power Consumption: Typical 6.5W (MIOL-4S-AE), 7.5W (MIOL-4S-AN), 8.5W (MIOC-4S-AN); Environment: Operation -20 ~ 60°C, Operational humidity 40°C @ 95% RH Non-Condensing
description: MIO Extension SBCs Modules are designed for embedded applications with flexible IO options and support for dual independent displays. They feature Intel Atom and Celeron processors, rich IO interfaces, and support for SUSIAccess Embedded Software APIs.
summary: MIO Extension SBCs Modules with Intel Atom and Celeron processors, flexible IO options, dual independent displays, and support for SUSIAccess Embedded Software APIs.
