name: SMARCsAL SMARC Module
processor: NXP LS Layerscape Processor DualCore Cortex A
memory: Up to 8 GByte DDRL non-ECC/ECC memory
voltage: 5V, 3.3V operates directly from single level Lithium Ion cells, fixed 5V, 12V power supplies
io: One PCIe line, QSGMII port, 2x Gigabit Ethernet TSN capable, 1x MBit Ethernet, 1x SDIO, 1x eMMC, Up to 4x PCIe, 1x LVDS dual channel or eDP, 1x HDMI, 1x DP, 4x USB, 2x USB, 2x serial interfaces, 2x RX/TX, 1x IS, 1x IC, 1x SPI, 1x GPIO, 1x CAN
thermal: Operating: 0°C to 60°C, Non-Operating: -40°C to 85°C
feature: TSN capable Ethernet ports, Security Chip Support Kontron Approtect, Uboot, Yocto Linux
specification: Dimensions: 82mm x 50mm, CPU: NXP Dual Cortex A LS processor, Main Memory: Up to 8 GByte DDRL ECC, Ethernet: 2x Gigabit Ethernet TSN capable, Storage: 1x MBit Ethernet, 1x SDIO, 1x eMMC, PCI Express Support: Up to 4x PCIe, Panel Signal: 1x LVDS dual channel or eDP, Display: 1x HDMI, 1x DP, USB: 4x USB, 2x USB, Serial: 2x serial interfaces, 2x RX/TX, Others: 1x IS, 1x IC, 1x SPI, 1x GPIO, 1x CAN, Power Supply: 5V, 3.3V operates directly from single level Lithium Ion cells, fixed 5V, 12V power supplies, Temperature: Operating: 0°C to 60°C, Non-Operating: -40°C to 85°C, Humidity: 93% relative Humidity at 40°C non-condensing according to IEC 60068-2-78
description: The SMARCsAL SMARC Module is a compact and versatile module featuring the NXP LS Layerscape Processor with DualCore Cortex A, designed for high-performance applications with up to 8 GByte DDRL non-ECC/ECC memory and multiple I/O interfaces.
summary: SMARCsAL SMARC Module with NXP LS Layerscape Processor, DualCore Cortex A, up to 8 GByte DDRL memory, and extensive I/O options, designed for high-performance applications.

name: ISDev Kit
io: USB, OLED SmartSwitches, OLED SmartDisplays
thermal: Not available
feature: Controls two OLED x SmartSwitches, Pushbutton functionality, RGB color OLED display, Adjustable audio feedback, User programmable images and attributes, Realtime control via host commands
specification: Power requirement: 5V, 500 mA max; Communication via USB; Controller board firmware customizable based on customer requirements
description: The ISDev Kit is designed to demonstrate the features of OLED SmartSwitches and SmartDisplays, and to facilitate their incorporation into new application designs. It includes necessary components to get started with using, testing, and ultimately incorporating NKK Switches' OLED SmartSwitch and SmartDisplay designs.
summary: The ISDev Kit is a development kit by NKK Switches that includes two OLED SmartSwitches and SmartDisplays, providing a platform for testing and incorporating these components into new designs. It features USB communication, adjustable audio feedback, and user-programmable images and attributes.

name: SUSIAccess
processor: Intel Atom Processor N, Intel Core iii mobile processor, Intel Core iii Celeron processor, Intel Cedar ViewM N D D processor
frequency: Intel Atom N: 1.6 GHz, Intel Atom N: 1.86 GHz
io: HDMI, GbE COM, PCI expansion, PC/104 expansion
thermal: Fanless design
feature: Remote Monitoring, Remote KVM, Remote On/Off, System Recovery, System Protection, One-click Installation, Custom App Packing, Rapid Deployment, Centralized management, Auto-deploy, upgrade, recovery functions
type: Computer On Modules, Industrial Motherboards, Single Board Computers, Fanless Embedded Box PCs, Digital Signage Media Players
specification: Intel Atom Processor N, Intel Core iii mobile processor, Intel Core iii Celeron processor, Intel Cedar ViewM N D D processor, DDR3/DDR3L SODIMM support up to 8GB, DC 12V wide range power input, HDMI, GbE COM, PCI expansion, PC/104 expansion, Fanless design
location: China (Kunshan), Netherlands (Eindhoven), USA (Milpitas, CA), Poland (Warsaw), Taiwan (Taipei)
description: SUSIAccess is a pioneering connected system management software designed for remote device management, allowing efficient remote monitoring, quick recovery, backup, and real-time remote configuration.
summary: SUSIAccess is a cloud-based remote device management software preloaded on Advantech embedded solutions, enabling centralized monitoring, management, and recovery of remote embedded devices in real-time.

name: genuLCDD Series
io: GPIO, SPI, I2C, TTL Serial, PWM, Analog Inputs
thermal: Not available
feature: Wide Viewing Angle (WVA), Capacitive Touch (DCT), Resistive Touch (DT), Super Bright (SB) variants, microSD memory card support, Audio output
specification: 320 x 240 resolution, 65K true-to-life colors, 3.2-inch TFT LCD, 3.6V to 4.2V operation, 3.3V tolerant GPIO, 3.3V level outputs, 3.3V analog inputs, 10-bit resolution
description: The genuLCDD Series is a range of intelligent display modules designed for easy integration and use, featuring a DIABLO Graphics Processor, various touch options, and wide viewing angles.
summary: The genuLCDD Series offers powerful intelligent display modules with DIABLO Graphics Processor, multiple touch options, and wide viewing angles, suitable for various applications.

name: QSXM QFN Style SolderDown Computer On Module
form: QFN type lead style, 0.5mm pitch pads
io: 2x USB, 2x Gb Ethernet RGMII, 2x eMMC/SD, 1x PCIe Gen 2 lane, 4x UART, 4x I2C, 4x SPI, 4x PWM, 4x SAI, Up to 100x General Purpose IO, 2x MIPI-CSI lane
thermal: Thermal pad for visual solder joint inspection and thermal management
feature: Industrial temperature range (-40°C to 85°C), MIPI DSI 4-lane, GC7000Lite 3D GPU, GCNanoUltra 2D GPU, 1080p video de-encode
specification: QS pin-compatible Solderdown version, 40mm square, 4.2mm total height, QFN type lead style, 0.5mm pitch pads, NXP i.MX 8M Mini Quad Cortex-A53, 1.8 GHz, 2GB LPDDR4, 8GB eMMC, Industrial temperature range (-40°C to 85°C), MIPI DSI 4-lane, GC7000Lite 3D GPU, GCNanoUltra 2D GPU, 1080p video de-encode, 2x USB, 2x Gb Ethernet RGMII, 2x eMMC/SD, 1x PCIe Gen 2 lane, 4x UART, 4x I2C, 4x SPI, 4x PWM, 4x SAI, Up to 100x General Purpose IO, 2x MIPI-CSI lane
description: The QSXM QFN Style SolderDown Computer On Module is part of the second generation QS module series, offering a compact and robust solution for industrial applications. It features the NXP i.MX 8M Mini Quad Cortex-A53 processor, 2GB LPDDR4 memory, and 8GB eMMC storage, with extensive connectivity options and industrial temperature range support.
summary: QSXM QFN Style SolderDown Computer On Module with NXP i.MX 8M Mini Quad Cortex-A53, 2GB LPDDR4, 8GB eMMC, and extensive I/O options, designed for industrial applications.

io: Parallel connector, PSU connector, USB connector, Fan header, SMBus, Chassis intruder, Front LAN LED, Serial port header, Audio Connector, External serial port, External USB port, VGA port, RJ45, PS/2 KB/mouse

description: The Advantech ASMB-785G2-00A1E is an ATX server board designed to support Intel Xeon E 2nd Generation Core Pentium processors. It features quad LANs with teaming function, IPMI support, and embedded software APIs and utilities. The board is optimized for rackmount placement and thermal green design.
summary: Advantech ASMB-785G2-00A1E is an ATX server board supporting Intel Xeon E 2nd Generation Core Pentium processors, with quad LANs, IPMI support, and optimized for rackmount placement.

name: COMebRP E
processor: Intel 13th Generation Core (Raptor Lake-P and Raptor Lake-H Series)
core: Varies by model (e.g., i7-13700HE: 6 P-cores, 8 E-cores)
frequency: Varies by model (e.g., i7-13700HE: P-cores 1.9 GHz base, 4.7 GHz turbo; E-cores 1.4 GHz base, 3.4 GHz turbo)
memory: Up to 64 GByte DDR4 SODIMM, non-ECC
io: Up to 2x Gb Ethernet TSN, 4x SATA 6Gb/s, Up to 1TB NVMe SSD, 8x PCIe, 3x DDI (DP/HDMI), VGA, LVDS, 4x USB 3.2 Gen 1, 8x USB 2.0, 2x serial interface (RX/TX), Intel High Definition Audio
thermal: Commercial temperature: 0°C to 60°C operating, -20°C to 70°C non-operating; Industrial temperature: -40°C to 85°C operating, -40°C to 85°C non-operating
feature: Trusted Platform Module (TPM), vPRO/AMT/TXT/AES Support, eDP instead of LVDS/VGA, USB-C, Fail Safe via 2nd SPI Flash
specification: COM Express Basic Type 6, Intel 13th Generation Core Processors, Up to 64 GByte DDR4 memory, Up to 2x Gb Ethernet TSN, Optional NVMe SSD onboard, Industrial grade versions available
location: Kontron Europe GmbH, Gutenbergstraße 2, 85737 Ismaning, Germany
description: The COMebRP E is a COM Express Basic Type 6 module featuring Intel 13th Generation Core processors, supporting up to 64 GByte DDR4 memory, and offering a range of I/O options including Ethernet TSN, SATA, PCIe, and USB. It is available in both commercial and industrial grade versions.
summary: COMebRP E is a versatile COM Express Basic Type 6 module with Intel 13th Generation Core processors, extensive memory support, and a wide range of I/O options, suitable for both commercial and industrial applications.

name: EDIPC Series
processor: Broadcom BCM quad core Cortex-A53 ARM v8 64-bit SoC
voltage: Wide voltage power input range DC 9V-36V
io: Dual LANs (2x Gigabit Ethernet, 1x 100M Ethernet), multiple RS ports, HDMI, USB, Micro SD card slot, Nano SIM card slot, GPIO, CSI, DSI
thermal: Not available
feature: High reliability, industrial computer based on Raspberry Pi CM4, dual-band WiFi, Bluetooth, 4G LTE, wide voltage power input, reverse polarity protection, overvoltage protection, overcurrent protection, integrated supercapacitor-backup power supply, RTC, Watch Dog, EEPROM crypto authentication, wide temperature range working environment, high-quality metal case, compatible with DIN-rail installation
specification: Supports up to 8GB LPDDR4 RAM, up to 64GB eMMC storage, Micro SD card storage expansion, M.2 NVMe SSD storage expansion, dual LANs, multiple RS ports, HDMI, USB, GPIO, CSI, DSI, dual-band WiFi, Bluetooth, 4G LTE, wide voltage power input range DC 9V-36V, reverse polarity protection, overvoltage protection, overcurrent protection, integrated supercapacitor-backup power supply, RTC, Watch Dog, EEPROM crypto authentication, wide temperature range working environment, high-quality metal case, compatible with DIN-rail installation
description: High reliability industrial computer based on Raspberry Pi CM4, featuring dual-band WiFi, Bluetooth, 4G LTE, wide voltage power input, and various I/O interfaces, designed for industrial applications.
summary: High reliability industrial computer based on Raspberry Pi CM4 with dual-band WiFi, Bluetooth, 4G LTE, and wide voltage power input, suitable for industrial applications.

name: AIMB-225
processor: AMD Merlin Falcon, Brown Falcon, Prairie Falcon
memory: Dual Channel DDR4 2133 MHz SDRAM, Max Capacity 32GB
io: DVI-D, DP, HDMI, Ethernet, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Audio Line, DC jack, LVDS, eDP, Serial (RS-232/422/485), SATA, PS/2 KB/MS, GPIO
thermal: Active and Passive cooling options
feature: Supports triple display, PCIe x1 and MiniPCIe expansion slots, WISE-PaaS/RMM Embedded Software APIs
specification: SOC: 28nm AMD Quad Core RX-421BD, RX-216GD, GX-212IJ; Max Speed: 3.6 GHz; L2 Cache: 2MB; BIOS: AMI 64Mbit SPI; Expansion Slot: M.2 E key, MiniPCIe, PCIe x1; Memory: Dual Channel DDR4 2133 MHz SDRAM, Max Capacity 32GB; Graphics Controller: AMD Radeon 3rd Generation GCN; Ethernet: 10/100/1000 Mbps, Realtek RTL8111G; SATA: 6.0 Gb/s; Rear IO: DVI-D, DP, HDMI, Ethernet, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Audio Line, DC jack; Internal Connector: LVDS, eDP, USB 2.0, USB 3.0, Serial (RS-232/422/485), SATA, PS/2 KB/MS, GPIO; Watchdog Timer: Programmable 1~255 sec/min; Power: Single voltage 12V DC input; Operating Temperature: 0 ~ 60°C (32 ~ 140°F); Dimensions: 170mm x 170mm
description: The AIMB-225 is an industrial motherboard that supports AMD Merlin Falcon, Brown Falcon, and Prairie Falcon processors. It features dual-channel DDR4 memory, multiple display outputs, and various expansion slots, making it suitable for a wide range of industrial applications.
summary: Advantech AIMB-225 is a Mini-ITX industrial motherboard supporting AMD processors with multiple display outputs and expansion slots, ideal for industrial applications.

name: TX Computer On Module
io: Ethernet, High-Speed USB OTG, Full-Speed USB Host, LCD controller, Still-picture camera interface, UART, SDCard, I2C, PWM, 1-wire, Keypad, Digital Audio, ACIS, Configurable serial peripheral interface, CAN, Touchscreen
thermal: Operating temperature range: -40°C to 85°C
feature: Standard TXDIMM pinout, Lowest cost, Industrial temperature range, Small size, High CPU performance, Cost critical factors
specification: Computer module with NXP i.MX 400 MHz, 64 MByte SDRAM, 128 MByte NAND Flash memory, SODIMM form factor, 67.6 mm x 26.4 mm x 4.2 mm, Operating temperature range: -40°C to 85°C, Multiple I/O interfaces including Ethernet, USB, LCD controller, Camera interface, UART, SDCard, I2C, PWM, 1-wire, Keypad, Digital Audio, ACIS, SPI, CAN, Touchscreen
description: The TX Computer On Module is a compact, high-performance, and cost-effective embedded system designed for industrial applications. It features an NXP i.MX processor, SDRAM, and NAND Flash memory, with a variety of I/O interfaces for versatile connectivity.
summary: A compact and cost-effective computer on module featuring an NXP i.MX processor, designed for industrial applications with multiple I/O interfaces and a wide operating temperature range.

frequency: 2.4 GHz, 2.8 GHz, 3.0 GHz, 3.2 GHz, 3.4 GHz, 3.6 GHz
memory: Dual Channel DDR3, up to 32 GB
io: VGA, DVI, Ethernet, USB, Audio, Serial, PS/2
thermal: Depends on CPU speed and cooler solution
feature: Supports dual display, dual GbE LAN, SATA RAID, AMT, TPM (optional), embedded software APIs and utilities
specification: Supports Intel Core i3/i5/i7, Pentium, Xeon processors, Q67 chipset, four DIMM sockets, dual display (VGA, DVI), dual GbE LAN, SATA RAID, AMT, TPM (optional), embedded software APIs and utilities
description: The AIMB Industrial Motherboard supports Intel Core i3/i5/i7, Pentium, and Xeon processors with a Q67 chipset. It features four DIMM sockets supporting up to 32 GB DDR3 memory, dual display (VGA, DVI), dual GbE LAN, SATA RAID, AMT, TPM (optional), and embedded software APIs and utilities.
summary: AIMB Industrial Motherboard with Intel Core i3/i5/i7, Pentium, and Xeon processor support, Q67 chipset, dual display, dual GbE LAN, and various advanced features.

name: GMB-N270
memory: Single channel DDR2 400/533 MHz, Max Capacity 2GB, 1 x 200-pin SODIMM
io: Rear IO: VGA, Ethernet, 4 x USB 2.0, Audio (Mic-in, Line-out, Line-in), Serial (RS-232), Parallel, PS/2 keyboard, PS/2 mouse; Internal Connector: LVDS, Inverter, 4 x USB 2.0, Serial (RS-232), IDE, 2 x SATA, CompactFlash, Parallel, 8-bit GPIO
thermal: CPU cooler included
feature: Supports dual display (VGA, TV-Out), dual GbE LAN, onboard TPM support (optional), PCI expansion
specification: Processor: Intel ATOM N270, 1.6 GHz; Chipset: Intel 945GSE + ICH7M; Memory: Single channel DDR2 400/533 MHz, Max Capacity 2GB, 1 x 200-pin SODIMM; Graphics: Intel 945GSE GMCH integrated Graphic Media Accelerator 950, Shared system memory up to 224MB; Ethernet: 2 x GbE LAN (Realtek RTL8111C); Storage: 2 x SATA, CompactFlash Type II; Rear IO: VGA, Ethernet, 4 x USB 2.0, Audio (Mic-in, Line-out, Line-in), Serial (RS-232), Parallel, PS/2 keyboard, PS/2 mouse; Internal Connector: LVDS, Inverter, 4 x USB 2.0, Serial (RS-232), IDE, 2 x SATA, CompactFlash, Parallel, 8-bit GPIO; Power: 5V, 12V, 3.3V, 5VSB
description: The GMB-N270 is an industrial Mini-ITX motherboard featuring an Intel ATOM N270 processor, supporting dual display, dual GbE LAN, and various expansion options.
summary: Advantech GMB-N270 is a Mini-ITX industrial motherboard with Intel ATOM N270 processor, dual display support, dual GbE LAN, and multiple expansion interfaces.

name: SPCIEC Single Board Computer
processor: LGA Intel Xeon E, 8th/9th generation Core i3/i5/i7/i9, Celeron, Pentium

voltage: AT/ATX power supply, Support AT/ATX mode
io: External IO: 2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (5Gb/s) Rear IO type A, 2 x USB 2.0 Type A; Internal IO: 1 x KB/MS, 1 x 6-pin, 2 x RS-232, 1 x 9-pin P2, 2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (5Gb/s), 1 x 10-pin, 2 x RS-232, 1 x 9-pin P2, 4 x SATA 6Gb/s, 2 x USB 2.0, 1 x 10-pin P2

feature: Supports LGA 1151 Intel Xeon E, Core i3/i5/i7/i9, Pentium, Celeron CPU, ECC/non-ECC DDR4, HDMI, DP, Dual Intel PCIe GbE, USB 3.2 Gen 1 (5Gb/s), SATA 6Gb/s, M.2, HD Audio, Intel AMT, RoHS
specification: CPU: LGA 1151 socket supports Intel Xeon E, 8th/9th generation Core i3/i5/i7/i9, Pentium, Celeron processor; Chipset: Intel C246; Memory: Four 288-pin 2666 MHz dual-channel DDR4 SDRAM unbuffered DIMMs, support 128GB ECC/non-ECC; BIOS: AMI UEFI BIOS; Graphic Engine: Intel HD Graphics Gen 9 Engines; Display Output: Dual display supported, 1 x HDMI 1.4 (4096 x 2160 @ 30Hz), 1 x Internal DisplayPort (4096 x 2160 @ 60Hz); Ethernet LAN: Intel I219-LM PHY LAN, Intel I210-AT PCIe controller; External IO Interface: 2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (5Gb/s) Rear IO type A, 2 x USB 2.0 Type A; Internal IO Interface: 1 x KB/MS, 1 x 6-pin, 2 x RS-232, 1 x 9-pin P2, 2 x USB 3.2 Gen 1 (5Gb/s), 1 x 10-pin, 2 x RS-232, 1 x 9-pin P2, 4 x SATA 6Gb/s, 2 x USB 2.0, 1 x 10-pin P2; Audio: Support 7.1 channel HD Audio, IEI AC-KIT-892HD-R10 kit; Front Panel: 1 x Front panel (Power LED, HDD LED, Speaker, Power Button, Reset Button, LAN LED), 2 x LAN LED, 1 x 8-pin TPM, 1 x 4-pin SMBus, 1 x 4-pin IC; Expansion: 1 x M.2 M key (2280), 1 x PCIe x16, 1 x PCIe x4 signal via golden finger, 1 x PCI signal via golden finger; Watchdog Timer: Software programmable, support 1-255 sec. system reset; Digital IO: 8-bit digital IO, 1 x 10-pin; FAN Connector: 1 x CPU smart fan (4-pin), 1 x System smart fan (4-pin); Power Supply: AT/ATX power supply, Support AT/ATX mode; Power Consumption: 12V@3.5A, 5V@2.5A, 3.3V@1.5A, 5VSB@0.1A (3.6GHz Intel Core i7-8700K CPU, four 8GB 2666 MHz DDR4 memory); Operating Temperature: 0°C ~ 60°C; Operating Humidity: 5% ~ 95%, non-condensing; Dimensions: 338 mm x 126 mm; Weight: GW: 1200g, NW: 800g; CE/FCC compliant
